A water-repellent finish helps keep you dry while tyre-like traction and a full-length Air unit provide grip and soft cushioning to help keep you running when conditions get slick.

title: Air Jordan 2 Retro Low
description: Wear a shoe with over 30 years of a legacy that remains fresh to this day. Making its debut in 1986, the AJ2 was the cool younger sibling of its famous predecessor—a sleeker and more pared-down version of the iconic AJ1. With premium leather and an Air-Sole unit underfoot, this throwback serves up the ultimate combo of wearability and style.

title: Nike Air Max Flyknit Racer
description: Throw tradition out the door? Never. Paying homage to both heritage and innovation, we've blended two icons to go beyond what's expected. Light, airy Flyknit pairs beautifully with oh-so-comfy Air Max cushioning. Lace up and let your feet do the talking.

title: Jordan 23 Engineered
description: Make a subdued statement in this medium-weight jacket. We took casual up a notch with sartorial details like bold zips and an intentionally oversized fit. This product is made from 100% recycled polyester fibres.

title: NikeCourt Victory
description: The NikeCourt Victory Tank is a soft, stretchy court essential that wicks sweat so you can stay focused on your match. This product is made from at least 75% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike Yoga
description: Let your aura radiate in these yoga leggings. A fluid colour pattern boosts your energy on and off the mat. The ultra-soft, stretchy fabric wicks sweat and hugs your body as you flow through your poses.

title: Tiger Woods '13
description: On the 10th anniversary of possibly the most popular Tiger Woods shoe ever, we're re-releasing the iconic design as our 1st true Tiger retro, an ahead-of-its-time game-changer. It offers the unique fit and feel of Nike Free technology for all-round comfort and roaring post-putt fist pumps. The outsole helps keep you steady, so you can channel your Tiger-esque club twirls after ripping a massive tee shot down the middle of the fairway.

title: Nike Streakfly
description: Our lightest racing shoe, the Nike Streakfly is all about the speed you need to take on the competition in a mile, 5K or 10K race. Low profile with sleek details, it feels like it disappears on your foot to help you better connect with the road on the way to your personal best. Pops of bright colour add a fun refresh, so you can turn heads at the finishing line.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Swoosh Fly
description: Let your true colours show in this Swoosh Fly tee. With soft, sweat-wicking fabric, you'll feel confident as you run the court.

title: Nike Swoosh On The Run
category: Women's Medium-Support Lightly Lined Sports Bra with Pockets
description: Feel confident and go all out—without having to leave anything behind—in this medium-support sports bra. 3 mesh-lined pockets hold your phone, a snack or an extra layer so you can explore without limits. The lightweight, sewn-in spacer lining feels breathable while still giving you a little coverage, and sweat-wicking tech helps you keep your cool on the run.

title: Nike Sportswear Club Fleece
description: Club Fleece, universally loved for its cosiness and consistency, is for everyone. These mid-rise Club Fleece trousers have a soft, familiar feel that makes it easy to stay warm and comfortable.

title: Nike Sportswear Phoenix Fleece
description: Rise up and transform your fleece wardrobe with strong cosy vibes. This Phoenix Fleece sweatshirt's oversized fit keeps you relaxed and comfy while taller ribbing at the hem and cuffs adds support and a bold look, helping you stand out.

title: Nike Fast
category: Women's Mid-Rise 7/8 Running Leggings with Pockets
description: Make those miles count in these Nike Fast Leggings. Stretchy materials and a supportive design combine with ventilation where you need it for cooling on the move. Plenty of pockets offer essential storage on the go.

title: Jordan
description: Add a little Jumpman to your favourite everyday crop top. Soft ribbed fabric stretches as you move, and the minimalistic design makes it a versatile wardrobe staple.

title: Nike Dunk Low
description: Created for the hardwood but taken to the streets, the '80s basketball icon returns with classic details and throwback hoops flair. Channelling vintage style back onto the streets, its padded, low-cut collar lets you take your game anywhere—in comfort.

title: Johor Darul Ta'zim F.C. 2022 Stadium Home
description: Like other shirts from our Stadium collection, this one pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking fabric to give you a game-ready look inspired by your favourite team.

title: Nike Sportswear Essentials
description: We updated our Club Essentials T-shirts to give them an easy fit. A roomier, shorter body and a slightly curved hem give this always-comfortable top its refreshed look.

title: Nike Sportswear Essential
description: Made from our heavyweight cotton jersey, the Nike Sportswear Essential T-Shirt has a soft, premium feel. Its boxy, throwback fit and simple Swoosh graphic make it an easy pick to pair with your favourite leggings or shorts.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: A piece you can dress up or down, this comfy tank top is made from a soft, stretchy jersey fabric to help keep you cool in warmer weather. Its boxier shape gives you extra room and coverage to make all your moves with confidence.

title: Nike Swoosh
description: These shorts are the ones that are ready to go wherever your run takes you. Their silky-smooth, ultra-soft woven fabric is balanced with sweat-wicking tech so you have ultimate comfort while feeling dry as your miles tick by.

title: Nike Wildhorse 8
description: Hoof it from the trailhead to the top, and handle vicious switchbacks, nosedive descents, rocky ridges and everything in between, in the Nike Wildhorse 8. With an abundance of rugged traction, cushioned responsiveness and trusted containment to help keep you upright, it's made for tough trail runs, the ones with limitless miles and gnarly terrain that are too enticing to turn down.

title: Air Jordan 2 Retro
description: MJ was wearing AJ2s during one of basketball's most iconic moments—you know the one. You might not dunk from the free-throw line, but you can still flex on everyone like he did. With equal parts style and luxury, these Js are the building blocks of drip. After all, big 'fits are just as important as historic dunks, right?

title: Nike Sportswear Collection
description: A little bit of the past goes a long way to bring this extra-relaxed fit up to speed. Made from extra-soft cotton and an always-relaxed fit, this top has flashes of streetwear style rooted in sport.

title: Nike Air Max Dawn
description: Rooted to Nike's athletics DNA, these kicks serve vintage running shoe vibes. The clean, tonal aesthetic lets the premium materials shine, including woven textiles and leather overlays on the upper. Plush foam and classic Air cushioning underfoot ensure that you go through your day feeling as good as you look.

title: Nike Sportswear Essential
description: When temperatures are on the rise, less really is more. This top is cropped and form-fitting to help you stay cool during the hottest days of the year.

title: Nike Victori One
description: From the beach to the streets, the Nike Victori One perfects a classic, must-have design. Delivering lightweight comfort that's easy to wear, it features new, softer foam that feels comfortable while the contoured footbed with grip pattern helps cradle and hold your foot in place. The wide, padded strap feels as good as it looks.

title: Air Jordan 1 Zoom CMFT 2 'Valentines Day'
description: Any time, anywhere, spread the love with some new Js this Valentines Day. From words of affirmation ('Damn, those look good!') to feelings of pure on-foot bliss (check out the lush velvet accents and springy Nike Zoom Air cushioning), these kicks know all the ways to make your heart go pitter-patter. The recessed Swoosh and updated collar bring a sweet look and feel to the classic design, and the richly textured leather is more decadent than a box of chocolates. Love yourself first—that's all we're saying.

title: Nike React Infinity 3
description: Still 1 of our most tested shoes, the Nike React Infinity 3 has soft and supportive cushioning. Its soft, stable feel with a smooth ride will carry you through routes, long and short. A breathable upper is made to feel contained, yet flexible. We even added more cushioning around the heel and ankle for a supportive sensation. Keep running—we've got you.

title: Nike Air Max Bliss LX
description: Intertwining functionality with fashion, this Air Max Bliss celebrates turn-of-the-century pop culture, music and sneakers. The inspiration stems from late '90s basketball and early 2000s skateboarding looks, and pairs soft cushioning with pillowy padding around the ankle. Time to party like it's nineteen-Nike-nine.

title: Nike Quest 5 Premium
description: You lace up in pursuit of new personal goals. Let the Nike Quest 5 help you reach those aspirations. This neutral sneaker gives you a smooth, comfortable ride with plenty of traction. We focused on our foam, adding more cushioning for a better transition from heel to toe. This special watercolour-like graphic with floral pastels and subtle yet saturated pinks and greens in the collar captures the vibe of the summer season.

title: Air Jordan 11 Retro Low
description: The legendary design of the AJ11 redefined the look of basketball. This edition features full-length cushioning, kitting out the iconic silhouette with extra-plush comfort.

title: Nike Burrow
description: There's nothing like cosying up to a campfire.Nothing like adventure.But also, there's nothing like the comfort of home.The Nike Burrow lets you bridge worlds.Slip them on and get lounging or step out of the tent and enjoy the fresh mountain air.Its fleece-like lining helps keep you warm.The marshmallow soft foam midsole/outsole with grippy traction pattern adds spring to your step.

title: Jordan Sport
description: Long summertime days meet legendary style. Inspired by an iconic MJ uniform design, the Diamond shorts are one of Jordan Brand's most beloved silhouettes. This pair comes with a lace overlay, adding a delicate touch to your casual 'fit.

title: NikeCourt Vapor Lite 2
description: Simple, but sleek. Subtle yet studded out with playability, speed and support. The Vapor Lite 2 is ready for the court right out of the box and offers comfort for the players who like to do it all. With a familiar, super-comfortable underfoot feeling, they can help you hammer that volley at the net and stay mobile during a long rally with optimal traction. Once your session is complete, they are comfortable enough to wear off the court walking to wherever your day leads next.

title: Nike Pegasus Trail 4 GORE-TEX
description: The Nike Pegasus Trail 4 GORE-TEX is made for those moments when you don't want to turn back, no matter what. Feel confident even in the most unforeseen weather conditions with waterproof GORE-TEX keeping you dry, so you can run harder for longer and take your wet run from the road to the trail without breaking stride. A waterproof layer paired with a higher ankle gaiter gives you extra coverage so you stay dry.

title: Nike Air More Uptempo
description: Keeping the exaggerated, graffiti-styled "AIR" graphics and full-length Nike Air cushioning you love from the original, your favourite hoops look gets transformed into slides you can easily slip on and off. Pairing '90s style with summertime comfort, its plush strap, airy perforations and soft foam make it a perfect choice—courtside, beachside and anywhere in between.

title: Nike Air Max Dawn
description: Root yourself in sporty athletics DNA with this throwback design. Inspired by iconic graphics of decades past, we've layered Nike logos in embroidery and leather for a retro feel, while modern design lines on the midsole and heel keep your look fresh. Lace up and give your day a look-good forecast.

title: Nike Vista
description: With all of the necessary elements you need for a day out (like plush padding and easy-to-style colours), the Nike Vista delivers on less is more. Lightweight, airy and supportive, it lets you bridge city living and nature with the pull of a strap.

title: Nike Victori One Next Nature
description: From the beach to the bleachers, the Nike Victori One Next Nature is a must-have slide for sunny days. Lightweight and easy to wear (or pack for your holiday), its soft, responsive foam makes lounging easy. Now made from at least 20% recycled materials by weight.

title: Nike Pegasus 40 Premium
description: A springy ride for any run, the Peg's familiar, just-for-you feel returns to help you accomplish your goals. This version has the same responsiveness and neutral support you love but with improved comfort in those sensitive areas of your foot, like the arch and toes. Whether you're logging long marathon miles, squeezing in a speed session before the sun goes down or hopping into a spontaneous group jaunt, it's still the established road runner you can put your faith in, day after day, run after run. This special design celebrates Nike co-founder Bill Bowerman and an iconic pamphlet he wrote that inspired a running movement.

title: Nike Asuna 2
description: Want to transition effortlessly between work and play? Built to feel good all day, these plush slides use a rugged tread pattern for traction on a variety of surfaces. The new and improved closure hugs the top of your foot just right. Step in, cinch it closed and get going.

title: Nike Air Trainer 1
description: Where will you take your sneakers? Anywhere and everywhere? Just like the originals from '87, these essential shoes let you cross from the suburbs to the city centre without a glitch. With retro details you love like the forefoot strap, plus split logos paying homage to the past and present of Nike, it keeps the legend alive and well. So, again, where will you take your sneakers? Anywhere and everywhere, indeed.

title: Nike Victori One
description: From the beach to the streets, the Nike Victori One perfects a classic, must-have design. Delivering lightweight comfort that's easy to wear, it features new, softer foam that feels comfortable while the contoured footbed with grip pattern helps cradle and hold your foot in place. The wide, padded strap feels as good as it looks.

title: Nike SB Blazer Low x Doyenne
description: Step beyond boundaries in the Blazer x Doyenne. Teaming up with the ungendered European-based skateboarding brand, the design embraces every person's multitude. Neutral colours and layered taping pair with blurred graphics to celebrate the intricacies of change and growth, while the durable pineapple canvas upper (yes, fabric made from the waste of pineapples) keeps you skating, falling and getting back up again and again. Don't get stuck in a box—lace up, blur the lines and find your harmony.

title: Nike Free RN NN
description: If it's freedom you crave, this road runner can help turn you loose. Feathery and flexible, its barefoot feel and Flyknit upper will have you freewheeling with joy, ready to go a few more strides.

title: Roshe G Next Nature
description: When the sun's beating down your back and your drive just landed in the bunker, lean into the Roshe 2, a design that can help you find your peace when your round isn't going your way. It's inherently simple and stylish, breathable and comfortable, perfect for playing in those sizzling-hot months. A full mesh upper and a soft, lightweight foam midsole form a cushioned combination to help maintain your internal calm, even if your game goes in the gutter.

title: Nike Air Adjust Force Unlocked By You
description: Adjust your expectations, because there are more ways than ever to personalise these shoes. Layer up in leather, nubuck and suede in every hue, then choose your Swoosh and airbags. And for the first time, you can add graphics to your outsole. This can include Swooshes, a wave half-tone and contrast-coloured rubber. Don't forget to customise the strap with iridescent materials, graphic looks and liquid leather. The first strap can feature up to 7 characters, too. You just took custom shoes to a new level.

title: NikeCourt Air Zoom NXT
description: Get the most out of every step in the NikeCourt Air Zoom NXT. Using insights from our top athletes, we added a large Zoom Air unit for extra bounce and spring when you push off to serve. After removing as much weight as we could without sacrificing durability, we also made sure this incredibly lightweight design was extremely comfortable. Thanks to a plush collar and a more linear, angular-shaped mesh and finish, you get the cushioned feel you love so you can focus on playing at your best.

title: Jordan Series Mid
description: Classic meets modern in this fresh take on a Jordan Brand essential. Durable leather and suede are bolstered by lightweight synthetics for extra support. The iconic midtop silhouette is more breathable than ever with a perforated sockliner. Plus, inspirational messages nodding to MJ's origin story are incorporated into the design, adding meaning to every step.

title: Nike Venture Runner
description: The Nike Venture Runner nods to the iconic shoes of the '80s that started the running revolution. The exposed stitching, high-flex upper and micro-branded heel clip add fresh DNA to the classic athletics look, while its airy mesh and new, soft insole elevate the feel.

title: Jordan Stay Loyal 2
description: Inspired by generations of Js, these kicks are a collage of cool. Design details recall decades of legendary shoes while paying homage to MJs storied career. Breathable mesh, sturdy leather and lightweight Air cushioning in the heel make it that much easier to walk in the footsteps of greatness.

title: NikeCourt Air Zoom Pro
description: Harness the power of your serve in the NikeCourt Zoom Pro. Working in tandem with the Zoom Air unit, it has a full-length plate that acts like a springboard. Flexing with every step, it helps enhance energy return and increase stability. With a more linear, angular-shaped mesh and finish and a padded collar, this responsive design also helps keep your feet cool and comfortable during your toughest matches.

title: Nike SB Ishod Premium
description: When it was time to build his signature shoe, Ishod Wair was all in from start to finish. Infused with elements taken from the iconic hoops shoes of the '90s (did you know basketball was Ishod's first love?), it walks the line between classic style and modern skate innovation. Plus, it's built with all the durability you need to skate hard—seriously, check out that new cupsole.

title: Nike Air Zoom Victory Tour 3 NRG
description: With its psychedelic colours and far-out fonts, this Air Zoom Victory Tour 3 is a total trip. You still get the robust comfort, unreal energy return and updated spikes, whether you're swinging through or playing through en route to 36. Find your happy medium, whether you're meditating in the middle of a round or speaking your best shot into existence. Groovy, baby.

title: Nike Sportswear Essentials
description: The Nike Sportswear Essentials Sling Bag is a comfortable carry-all with room for storing a reusable water bottle, packable jacket and more. Additional zip pockets and an adjustable shoulder strap help you stay organised and ready for wherever the day takes you. This product is made from at least 50% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike Academy Team
description: The Nike Academy Team Duffel Bag is a durable design built to keep you organised. Designated compartments provide space for your ball, boots and clothes—while multiple straps let you comfortably carry your gear when you're on the go.

title: Nike Dunk Low Unlocked By You
description: Cheetah and tiger and croc—oh my! It's time to design the Dunk of your dreams. The left and right shoes can be customised independently (excluding character personalisation), so let your imagination go wild. Velvet cheetah and tiger prints in a '90s-inspired colour palette mix with a textural croc suede for the ultimate maximalist look. Don't forget your shoelery for the finishing touch.

title: Nike Heritage
description: Grab what you need and get going with the Nike Heritage Hip Back. With a large main compartment to store your phone, keys and anything else you need to grab and go, this bag also features a smaller double-zip back pocket to keep the small stuff in check. An adjustable buckle strap helps keep you comfortable no matter how you wear this bag.

title: Nike Everyday Plus
description: A true hybrid of style and comfort, the Nike Everyday Plus Crew Socks are cushioned in keys zones to keep you comfortable throughout the day.Dri-FIT fabric and breathable mesh on the top of your foot help keep your feet feeling cool and dry while an arch band provides a snug fit.

title: F.C. Barcelona Strike
description: Stay ready for everyday play. A textured 12-panel design creates a consistent touch across the pitch and built-in grooves create a more stable flight for those training and match shots.

title: Nike Calm
description: When it comes to these slides, it's all in the name. Take a deep breath and slip into a minimalist look with maximalist cushioning. Contoured foam is seamlessly created from one piece, and cradles your feet to help keep them in place. To top it off, the water-friendly design dries quickly—making it ideal for relaxing poolside. You get all of the style, none of the effort. It's time for some Calm.

title: Nike Air Force 1 High By You
description: Let your design shine in satin, keep it classic in canvas and get luxe with leather. No matter what you choose, these AF-1s are all about you. 12 classic colour choices and an additional Gum option for the sole mean your shoe is destined to be one of a kind, just like you.

title: Air Jordan Low SE
description: Get into some summery fun in your new fave AJ1s. Made with a combination of suede and canvas, this pair gives you the comfort you know and love with a seasonal update.

title: Nike Apex
description: Welcome the Nike Apex Bucket into your line-up. The mid-depth design is made from soft cotton and features an embroidered Futura logo for a clean Nike finish. The wash treatment softens the feel and gives it a vintage look that keeps ageing to perfection the more you wear it.

title: Nike Park
description: Get ready to score with Nike Park Football. It has a durable surface with high-contrast graphics, designed for easy tracking across the pitch.

title: Nike Air
description: Made to stretch and support, these high-waisted leggings sit higher on your hips for a fit that stays in place. Soft and smooth against your skin, the jersey cotton blend breathes so you can stay comfortable all day long.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: With an oversized fit, this top is all about comfort. An extreme drop in the shoulders and voluminous sleeves provide a carefree, confident look you can pair with your favourite leggings or shorts.

title: Jordan Flight Fleece
description: Meet your favourite summer staple. Made from French terry, they have a relaxed fit and a secure stretch waistband. A small Jumpman patch on the pocket gives an authentic MJ touch.

title: Nike Hoops Elite
description: Meet the backpack that delivers both on and off the court. It's got plenty of room to store all of your game-day gear, including pockets for all the small items you can't succeed without. Between the padded shoulder straps, a comfortable padded back panel and the stabilising chest strap, carrying this backpack to training, the game or work is effortless.

title: Nike Sportswear Collection
description: With a hook-and-bar closure on the traditional zip fly and elastic at the back, these woven trousers pair crisp, tailored style and a relaxed fit to keep you feeling chic—and comfortable—all day long. Inspired by heritage Nike Sportswear, their design refreshes a staple with panel details that help reshape your warm-weather wardrobe.

title: Nike Air Force 1 Mid By You
description: Let your design shine in satin, keep it classic in canvas or get luxe with leather. No matter what you choose, these AF-1s are all about you. 12 colour choices and an additional Gum option for the sole mean your design is destined to be one of a kind, just like you.

title: Nike Sportswear Circa 96
description: Take it back to basketball in '96—the shorts were baggier, the jerseys were longer and the WNBA was about to change the game forever. Snap up this roomy anorak for a little extra shine and style. The exterior satin fabric is smooth and extra soft while the lining feels cosy warm and slides over layers easily.

title: Nike Go
category: Women's Firm-Support High-Waisted Capri Leggings with Pockets
description: Push yourself forwards with the right balance of support and comfort with our Nike Go leggings. Squat-proof—even during your toughest workouts—their sleek, midweight InfinaLock fabric feels compressive and supportive in all the right places. Multiple pockets let you carry everything you could need, whether you're hitting the trail, the gym or the mat.

title: Nike SB
description: Made from soft jersey fabric, the Nike SB T-Shirt is a skate staple that features a classic logo on the chest.

title: Nike Dri-FIT One
description: Let your inner goddess shine in this easy-fitting crop top. From the machines to the mats to the miles, its sweat-wicking tech and ultra-soft, stretchy fabric have you covered so you can focus on redefining victory.

title: Nike Air
description: Made to look and feel vintage, this heavyweight cotton tee has a roomy fit and satiny logo for a premium feel you'll want to wear every day.

title: Nike SB
description: Made from soft jersey fabric, the Nike SB T-Shirt is a skate staple that features a classic logo on the chest.

title: Jordan Jumpman Classic99 Metal
description: Keep your head in the game in the Jordan Jumpman Classic99 Metal Cap. It's made from flexible stretch-woven material with a pre-curved bill and a metal Jumpman design as its centrepiece.

title: Jordan Pro Cap
description: Jordan on your feet, Jordan on your dome. The Pro Cap is a structured snapback made from a woven crown for an elevated look that's made to last. Plus, it's decked out in understated Jordan graphics.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Talk about a blast from the past. Rep your love for sport with this lightweight layer inspired by classic athletics pieces. The water-resistant fabric helps keep you dry in light rain, making this jacket ideal for everyday wear. Complete your look by pairing it with the matching skirt or your favourite bottoms.

title: Nike Fast Repel
description: Don't let the rain stop you in this lightweight, water-repellent jacket. With a stowaway hood and curved, elongated back hem for extra coverage, you can feel prepared for changing conditions. Add the vent on the back that helps increase airflow, and you're ready to push through that extra mile, whatever the weather.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Race
description: Lightweight fabric and a streamlined design keep you speeding for the finishing line in the Nike Dri-FIT Race Top. Mesh in key areas helps keep you cool with every step. This product is made from 100% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike Air
description: This lightweight nylon jacket has a soft, semi-structured feel for a crisp look and long-lasting comfort.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Victory
description: We took your favourite polo and gave it a feel-good update. The Nike Dri-FIT Victory Polo is crafted from lightweight, breathable fabric that's made with 100% recycled polyester fibres. This otherwise-classic design has a slightly longer, 4-button placket that keeps your look fresh.

title: Nike Tempo
description: The Nike Tempo Shorts deliver a classic fit with sweat-wicking technology to help keep you dry and comfortable.Mesh on the sides adds ventilation while the shortened length reduces distractions.The elastic waistband with drawcord lets you easily adjust your fit.This product is made from at least 75% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Jordan Hex Mule
description: Introducing the Hex Mule. Inspired by all things angular and made from one solid piece of matt foam, the modern and minimalist design doesn't look the same from any two angles—but it does look good in any situation. And side vents keep your feet airy, no matter what your day brings.

title: Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG
description: Game on! Inspired by MJ's school days, this energetic colourway brings A+ energy to the streets. Bold bursts of Game Royal and Varsity Maize let you join the team in style, while subtly weathered leather ups the vintage appeal. Crafted details, like the woven tongue label, hang tag and Wings logo, add a premium boost to any outfit. And the finishing touch? Nike Air cushioning underfoot lets you keep pace, so nothing holds you back from showing off your legendary look.

title: Nike Dunk Low Premium MF
description: Created for the hardwood but taken to the streets, the '80s b-ball icon returns with classic details and throwback hoops flair. Channelling vintage style back onto the streets, its padded, low-cut collar lets you take your game anywhere—in comfort.

title: Nike Air Max Dawn Next Nature 365
description: Rooted in sporty athletic DNA, the Air Max Dawn blends vintage running vibes with modern cushioning to create a shoe that feels as fresh as a new day. Easy to style and oh-so comfy, they're the perfect start to your day.

title: Nike Dri-FIT
description: Turn up the heat in this relaxed tee. Sleek fabric wicks sweat away so you stay dry and comfy while you work out.

title: Nike Air Max 90 Futura
description: The Nike Air Max 90 Futura re-imagines the icon of Air through your eyes—from design to testing to styling. Sawtooth edging around the toe and a partially floating Swoosh deliver skilfully crafted luxury. Plush padding around the ankle is mixed with trusted Air cushioning to bring you first-class comfort. It's playful, comfortable, sporty and whatever else you want it to be.

title: Nike SB Zoom Pogo Plus Premium
description: Skate in comfort with the Pogo Plus. With durable suede and a broken-in fit straight out of the box, it's your go-to for any skate session. The raised taping increases control for the perfect flick, while Zoom Air cushioning delivers the ultimate boardfeel.

title: Nike Cortez Platform Unlocked By You
description: It's time to level up your style. This Cortez isn't for the faint of heart, but we don't think you need any cheat codes to ace this platform. Level 1: Decide how high you want to go. Whether you want a traditional look or really feel like stepping it up, there's an outsole complete with custom colour-blocking just for you. Level 2: Customise your upper. Vintage, premium or somewhere in between—choose between 3 kinds of materials in 16 colours. Level 3: Collect your jewels. Go for either a jewelled or classic Swoosh logo in tumbled leather or suede, or switch it up for each side of the shoe. Level 4: Finishing touches. An option for ribbon lacing and dubrae shoelery to finish off your look.

title: Nike Zegama
description: Navigate the up and downs of uncompromising terrain with the Nike Zegama. Developed with great grip and stability, it has you covered, so you can keep climbing and reach greater personal heights when the going gets grimy and gritty. Whether it's a challenging, rocky landscape going uphill or a steep, slick decline down a treacherous trail, feel confident when you decide to off-road it.

title: Nike Zenvy
description: Whether it's yoga or a bike ride or a walk, you can move freely in our unbelievably soft Nike Zenvy leggings. Their InfinaSoft fabric is lightweight—but still squat-proof!—with softness that you can feel with every bend, stretch and shift. Fewer pockets give you a streamlined look, but the drop-in pocket in the middle of the back is still big enough to hold your phone. Plus, they're durable enough for you to move, wash and wear again and again.

title: Nike Pegasus 40
description: A springy ride for every run, the Peg's familiar, just-for-you feel returns to help you accomplish your goals. This version has the same responsiveness and neutral support you love but with improved comfort in those sensitive areas of your foot, like the arch and toes. Whether you're logging long marathon miles, squeezing in a speed session before the sun goes down or hopping into a spontaneous group jaunt, it's still the established road runner you can put your faith in, day after day, run after run.

title: Air Jordan 1 Mid
description: The Air Jordan 1 Mid brings full-court style and premium comfort to an iconic look. Its Air-Sole unit cushions play on the hardwood, while the padded collar gives you a supportive feel.

title: Nike Air Max 90 G
description: The original Nike Air Max 90 was renowned for its clean lines and timeless style. The Nike Air Max 90 G stays true to the OG icon with a few updates made for golf, like integrated traction and a thin overlay that helps keep out water.

title: Nike Sportswear Air
description: Embrace the high-rise flare this season. Thick but still lightweight, peachy-soft but still strong—they stretch easily with your every move.

title: Nike Air More Uptempo SE
description: More than perhaps any other silhouette, the Air More Uptempo encapsulates '90s basketball flavour at its finest. Big and loud, the unapologetic design represents a hybrid of style and innovation that made major waves when it debuted—and still turns heads today. This crafted take keeps it subtle with a crisp white upper, set off by pops of Metallic Silver. The iconic AIR graphic comes outlined in metallic detailing for a little extra off-court flair. After all, "a little extra" is what these shoes do best.

title: Nike Air Humara
description: Tame the wild—says who? Delivering vintage ACG aesthetics and Nike trail running DNA, the Air Humara sets you up to break free from mediocrity. Fast, comfy and with a whole lot of outdoor appeal, its premium materials and fresh-air colours encapsulate the '90s zeitgeist. Turn it over: its textile-wrapped midsole puts you a step ahead of the rest, while Zoom Air in the forefoot and Nike Air in the heel deliver legendary comfort so you can stay untamable.

title: Nike Free RN NN
description: If it's freedom you crave, this road runner can help turn you loose. Feathery and flexible, its barefoot feel and Flyknit upper will have you freewheeling with joy, ready to go a few more strides.

title: Nike Metcon 9 AMP
description: Whatever your "why" is for working out, the Metcon 9 makes it all worth it. We improved on the 8 with a larger Hyperlift plate and added rubber rope wrap. Intended for lifters, trainers and go-getters, some of the greatest athletes in the world swear by it, and it's still the gold standard that delivers day after day. This balanced, vitamin-inspired design radiates with the vibrant energy you bring to your workout and those around you.

title: Nike Air Rift
description: Summer's on the way. You ready? The Air Rift most definitely is. With its split-toe design and Nike Air cushioning underfoot, you'll feel better than barefoot for everything the sunny season has to offer. Beach days, forest strolls, city festivals—whatever, really. And do we even need to mention that camo and orange combo? See it, feel it, believe it.

title: Nike Zoom Bella 6
description: Unleash your innermost strength and spirit in the Nike Zoom Bella 6. This design supports heavy lifts, explosive movements and primal post-set struts as you flaunt your hard-earned progress on the gym floor. Newly implemented Zoom Air cushioning gives you pop, and an updated forefoot ensures all sorts of foot shapes can flex through their workouts in true style.

title: Nike Internationalist By You
description: The Nike Internationalist Low By You celebrates a 1980s icon originally designed for serious runners who knew no bounds. Now fashioned for streetwear, this Internationalist lets you choose the materials from a selection of low-key earth tones. Top it off with throwback Nike branding or personal details so you can stand out in your neighbourhood or all over the world.

title: Jordan Series ES
description: Inspired by Mike's backyard battles with his older brother Larry, the Jordan Series references their legendary sibling rivalry throughout the design. The rubber sole offers more than just impressive traction—it also tells the story of how MJ came to be #23. Look for the hidden reminder to "Swing for the Fence", a direct quote from Larry to his little bro.

title: Jumpman MVP
description: We didn't invent the remix—but considering the material we get to sample, this one's a no-brainer. We fired up the SP-12 and took elements from the AJ6, 7 and 8, making them into a completely new shoe that celebrates MJ's first 3-peat championship run. With leather, textile and nubuck details, these sneakers honour one legacy while encouraging you to cement your own.

title: Nike Winflo 10
description: A balanced ride to help kick-start your run, the Winflo 10 is great whether you're a creature of habit logging your weekly mileage, a rookie hoping to turn intrigue into routine or just joining a friend for a spontaneous weekend run. A neutral support shoe with springy Nike Air, plus more space in the forefoot, leads to a comfortable, bouncy feel. It's ready-made for your run, whenever the road is calling your name.

title: Nike Air Max 1 '87 Safari
description: The first shoe to reveal Air to the world puts you in touch with your wild side. The animal-print graphic on the Swoosh and the mudguard celebrates the iconic Air Safari, while Summit White and Sail keep it grounded and easy to style. Add this to the Parisian-inspired design, tried-and-tested cushioning and classic wavy mudguard and it's no wonder it's reigned supreme since 1987.

title: Nike Gripknit Phantom GX Elite Dynamic Fit AG By You
description: Obsessed with perfecting your craft and on-the-pitch look? We design Elite boots for you and the world's biggest stars to give you high-level quality, because you demand greatness from yourself and your footwear. Infused with revolutionary Nike Gripknit, this boot provides better touch on the ball in an intuitive design that's made to optimise performance both when striking and during close control. Make your own style with a ridiculously extensive palette of colour options and hit the pitch with full creative control.

title: Nike Air Max Alpha Trainer 5
description: Finish your last rep with power and rack it with a roar that stuns the gym floor in the Nike Air Max Alpha Trainer 5. The Max Air cushioning offers comfortable stability for lifting whether it's a light or heavy day. A wide, flat base gives you enhanced stability and grip for all kinds of tough workouts without sacrificing style, as you roam from station to station and set to set.

title: Nike Pegasus Trail 4 By You
description: Running is your daily ritual, taking you from road to trail as you seek out new adventures and goals. Let the Nike Pegasus Trail 4 take you there and back again with its supportive and springy feel. Underfoot traction keeps you going over rocky terrain, while still providing a smooth ride for the road. Pick from a palette of energetic colours and extensive design options, like 4 different Swoosh logos and multiple iconic Peg Trail designs that make your run pop. This Peg Trail 4's canvas is your easel, your mind eye's is the paint board—go make it yours.

title: Nike Air Max 1 '87 By You
description: The classic Air Max gets refreshed with a premium look for you, By You. Choose between nubuck leather, smooth leather and a polished croc that reveals another colour with wear. Then, line your shoe with traditional mesh or go luxe with velvet. Add a jewelled or classic Swoosh logo and choose between gold or silver shoelery that doubles as a bracelet. And don't forget to add some colour to your Nike Air unit, midsole and outsole.

title: KD15 EP
description: Game-making plays and impossible shots are all in a day's work for Kevin Durant. Give him the ball and he makes the game look easy. The KD15 is stripped down to provide just what he wants: plenty of bounce, a secure fit and a broken-in feel. Fewer materials underfoot and throughout the upper helps minimise distractions while optimising energy return and all-round comfort—vital for players like KD who never stop moving. This special KD15 salutes hip-hop's 50th anniversary with nods to the past and present. This version is designed for outdoor court use with its extra-durable outsole.

title: Nike Offcourt Adjust
description: Post game, errands and more—adjust your comfort on the go. The adjustable, padded strap lets you perfect your fit, while the lightweight foam midsole brings first-class comfort to your feet.

title: Air Jordan 5 Retro SE Craft
description: Bring some pop to your look with the AJ5, the shoe that's recognisably cool. All the original elements are here: lace toggles, premium leather and that unmissable midsole. Updated with new colours and textures, here's a shoe that keeps every look fresh.

title: Nike Kiger 9
description: When approaching rocky and technical terrain, go with the comfort and speed of the Kiger 9, there for every unexpected twist and tight turn. Equipped with full-length Nike React foam and a revamped breathable upper, this agile, quick trainer helps keep you zigzagging in and out of trails with speed. It's lower to the ground and lighter than our previous iteration, so that you can handle the off-road path with pace and security.

title: Nike Air Max 90
description: Lace up and feel the legacy. Produced at the cross section of art, music and culture, this champion running shoe helped define the '90s. Worn by presidents, revolutionised through collabs and celebrated through rare colourways, its striking visuals, Waffle outsole and exposed Air cushioning keep it alive and well.

title: Nike Infinity Ace Next Nature
description: Your game and your swing can't be pigeonholed. The all-new Infinity Ace supports your individuality, the inner independence that allows you to go for the green when the book says go for a lay-up or hit a drive down a narrow fairway when friendlier approaches would suit. With super-soft cushioning around sensitive areas like the ankle and midfoot, it has you ready to play 18.

title: Nike Air Max TW
description: So you're in love with the classic look of the '90s, but you've got a thing for today's fast-paced culture. Meet the Air Max TW. Ready to highlight any outfit, its lightweight upper pairs angular and organic lines to create an entrancing haptic effect. The contrasting colourways make it easy to style. And if you're ready for the next step, the 5 windows underfoot deliver a modern edge to visible Nike Air cushioning.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Ace
description: Keep the sun and sweat out of your eyes with our low-depth Nike Ace visor. This unstructured visor with a curved bill features stretchy fabric that will keep you cool and fresh during warm days on the court and the course.

title: Jordan Pro Cap
description: You got some Jordans on your feet—why not rock some Jordan up top to match? The Pro Cap is a structured snapback made from a woven crown for an elevated look that's made to last. Plus, it's decked out in fresh Jordan graphics.

title: Nike
description: Elevate your look without sacrificing style. With multiple carrying options, this bag will quickly become your go-to bag—from Sunday brunches to quick errands around town.

title: Jordan Rise Cap
description: Is your outfit missing an understated dad hat to show the world your Jordan pride? We've got you. This classic structured fit has a sloped crown and a curved bill for a casual, broken-in look. And the metal Jumpman emblem makes a perfectly subtle statement.

title: Nike Air Max Solo
description: These sneakers are for the Air Max superfans. By combining elements from past Air Max models (like the AM90-inspired heel cup), we created a whole new look. The AM180 influences the textured Air unit, which delivers just the right amount of cushioning. Go ahead—Max out your look.

title: Nike Boonie
description: The Nike Boonie Bucket Hat has you covered with a 360-degree brim and a drawcord that cinches down for a stay-put fit when you're on the move.Sweat-wicking power and built-in vents team up to help keep your head dry and cool.Camo print creates a commanding look.

title: Nike AeroBill
description: The Nike AeroBill Visor is sweat wicking and breathable, with laser perforations around the front, back and sides for added ventilation. Its hook-and-loop closure lets you adjust the fit.

title: Jordan Golf Rise Cap
description: Straightforward, but with some of that Jordan flair you've come to expect, this hat's got you covered through the full 18. The structured fit has a sloped crown and a curved bill for a casual, broken-in look. Sweat-wicking technology helps keep your forehead fresh, while that elephant print on the underbill keeps your look alive.

title: Nike Everyday Plus
description: Enjoy the now in durable socks meant for everyday movement. Areas on the heel and forefoot provide zonal cushioning, and sweat-wicking technology helps keep your feet dry and comfortable—and while they can't promise you'll always have fun while you're working up a sweat, they can help you stay cool in the moment.

title: Nike Club
description: Bring the casual vibes to any outfit with our Nike Club cap. Its classic 6-panel design comes in soft, unstructured twill fabric with a pre-curved bill for easy styling. The mid-depth crown features an outlined Swoosh for a polished finish. The back strap and tri-glide closure help you find the right fit.

title: Nike Sportswear Essentials
description: An elevated take on a classic, the Nike Sportswear Tote keeps your everyday essentials organised. The spacious main compartment features interior pockets and a laptop sleeve for secure organisation, along with an exterior pocket for quick access to your keys, cards and phone. This product is made from at least 65% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike Charge
description: Safety shouldn't get in the way of playing your best game. With a hard shell that creates low-profile coverage, these shinguards also have a foam back for comfort, allowing you to kick and pass in comfort.

title: Nike Everyday Lightweight
description: Grab a pair of socks to match your mood. If a bright and energy-filled day takes you on a new adventure—or maybe just a casual walk around the block—you'll be prepared with sweat-wicking technology keeping you cool and dry, plus a snug band around the arch for added support.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Club
description: Open the doors for the Club Cap. The structured, mid-depth crown keeps you feeling comfortable and secure. Sweat-wicking fabric helps keep you dry and a tri-glide closure makes sure you're ready to go from 1 activity to the next with a fit that's just right.

title: Brazil Strike Society
description: From training drills to hitting the pitch, take your football training to the next level. Made with a durable outer shell made to withstand every kick and strike, this ball will quickly become your go-to training session ball.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: A washed fabric on the crown of the Nike Sportswear Bucket Hat gives it a soft, well-worn feel.Its unstructured crown and brim offer a laidback look and added coverage from the elements.

title: Serena Williams Design Crew
description: Whether it's winning the four major championships or simply hitting the ball at a local court, wear the socks made to match the confidence and style of Serena Williams. With sweat-wicking technology to help keep your feet dry and a band around the arch that provides support where you need it most, it'll be game, set, match to all those other socks sitting in your drawer.

title: Nike Academy
description: The Nike Academy Football features innovative grooves designed for consistent spin when the ball is in the air. High-contrast graphics help you easily track the ball.

title: Nike Sportswear Essential
description: Roomy and relaxed, this oversized tee is perfect when you want to rock a bold look but still be comfy. A simple Swoosh design and heavyweight cotton fabric give you a clean, confident look you can wear every day of the year.

title: Nike Everyday Plus
description: An elevated twill pattern, undyed yarns and zonal cushioning mean pure performance, whether it's on your daily grind or a long hike. And we didn't forget the essentials: A band around the arch keeps your socks feeling snug and supportive while ribbing at the top helps them stay up.

title: Nike ESC
description: Inspired by the rugged look of early 20th-century trousers that were made with a focus on practicality and durability, these trousers have been adapted for their comfort, style and function. We're talking features you can appreciate whether you're standing on scaffolding or sitting courtside.

title: Nike Sportswear Essentials
description: We updated our Club Essentials T-shirts to give them an easy fit. A roomier, shorter body and a slightly curved hem give this always-comfortable top its refreshed look.

title: Nike Yoga Dri-FIT
description: Made from soft, stretchy sweat-wicking fabric, this top is a breathable layer designed to keep you comfortable while you flow through your movements. Dropped shoulder seams, exaggerated side vents and a longer back hem let you bend, stretch and move freely between your poses. This product is made from at least 75% sustainable materials, using a blend of both recycled polyester and organic cotton fibres. The blend is at least 10% recycled fibres or at least 10% organic cotton fibres.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Freshly mixed for the season, this relaxed tee's swirled version of our classic Futura logo will help keep you cool in hot weather.

title: Nike Standard Issue
description: Whether you're training hard or navigating life between games, this loose-fitting jersey combines soft fabric and sweat-wicking technology to keep you comfortable. The woven logo on the bottom hem is the symbol of Nike Women's Basketball.

title: Nike Sportswear Essential
description: Made from a soft, smooth woven fabric with a roomy fit, these shorts deliver a comfortable, casual feel you can wear all day. Cargo pockets provide a utility look and secure small-item storage. Designed to sit at your belly button, they're a natural fit for your favourite cropped tops.

title: Nike Air Dri-FIT
description: Rack up the miles with your club or go at it solo in this raglan-sleeved Nike Air top. Sweat-wicking tech works with an easy fit to help you stay dry and comfortable.

title: Nike Yoga
description: The Nike Yoga Leggings wrap you in buttery-soft fabric that's perfect for your flow.These 7/8-length leggings have a high-rise waistband with a pocket in the front that lets you tuck away your phone.Stretchy fabric with Dri-FIT Technology helps keep you cool on the mat, and minimal seams create a smooth silhouette.Made with at least 75% recycled polyester fibres, the leggings help bring purpose to your practice.

title: Jordan Chicago
description: These trousers pair the luxe quality and timeless story of Jordan Brand with a modern, wide-leg silhouette. Cinch ties at the ankle let you switch up your fit, while the all-over cargo pockets double down on utility and style.

title: Nike Swoosh Run
description: The Nike Swoosh Run Top is designed for all your runs, short and long. Soft, smooth fabric comes in a breathable silhouette to keep you cool and dry. This product is made from 100% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike Air Dri-FIT
description: Stay cool and dry while you hit your stride in these lightweight running trousers. The woven fabric with sweat-wicking tech and the mesh panels on the lower legs work together to keep you comfortable from start to finish. Adjustable components let you zip, tighten and run like air.

title: Nike Universa
category: Women's Medium-Support High-Waisted 7/8 Leggings with Pockets
description: Our Nike Universa leggings help smooth and lift, stretching freely with your every move. Wherever your workout takes you, their squat-proof, mid-weight InfinaSmooth fabric gives you uncompromising comfort and feels cool and sleek to the touch. Plus, they're durable enough for you to flex, wash and wear again and again. They're the pair you'll reach for whether you need something for your everyday run, everyday training or just every day.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Keep it effortless and carefree in these snug knit trousers. Their ribbed fabric is lighter than fleece but still feels extraordinarily soft and comfy. The flare on the lower leg creates a throwback look and puts the spotlight on your shoes.

title: Nike Sportswear Phoenix Fleece
description: Rise up and transform your fleece wardrobe with comfy vibes. The cropped length and extra-wide trouser legs ensure your look is anything but basic. Our midweight brushed fleece feels extra soft on the inside and smooth on the outside, helping you stay cosy while keeping its structured shape.

title: Nike Pegasus 40 SE
description: A springy ride for any run, the Peg's familiar, just-for-you feel returns to help you accomplish your goals. This version has the same responsiveness and neutral support you love but with improved comfort in those sensitive areas of your foot, like the arch and toes. Whether you're logging long marathon miles, squeezing in a speed session before the sun goes down or hopping into a spontaneous group jaunt, it's still the established road runner you can put your faith in, day after day, run after run. Sharp, bright hues complement dark-room-colour neutrals, speaking to an inclusive world where digital and physical coexist in harmony.

title: Nike Dri-FIT One
description: Ready for a workout or down to chill—the Nike One Biker Shorts are a versatile layer that's up for whatever you are. The super-comfortable design wicks sweat to help keep you dry. Plus, you can't see through the fabric, so you can feel confident knowing you're covered.

title: Nike Sportswear Essential
description: The perfect complement to your favourite tops and tees, the Nike Sportswear Leggings have a high-rise design and a stretchy waistband that sits above your navel. The soft cotton blend wicks sweat, making these full-length leggings an easy choice for everyday wear.

title: Nike Waffle Debut
description: Retro gets modernised with these sleek sneakers inspired by the Nike Daybreak. Era-echoing suede and nylon are paired in complementary colours, and the updated wedge midsole gives you an extra lift. Style, comfort, iconic Waffle outsole—this is a perfect new addition to your daily rotation.

title: Nike Victori One
description: From the beach to the streets, the Nike Victori One perfects a classic, must-have design. Delivering lightweight comfort that's easy to wear, it features new, softer foam that feels comfortable. The contoured footbed with grip pattern helps cradle and hold your foot in place. The wide, padded strap feels as good as it looks.

title: Nike SB Chron 2 Canvas
description: The Nike SB Chron 2 Canvas is the newest member of the Chron family.The revamped design includes a reshaped collar and heel for an improved fit—all while maintaining the comfort and performance you expect from Nike SB.

title: Nike SB
description: Pull on this soft midweight cotton Nike SB tee with a printed daisy graphic and bring some vibrant energy to your day. The loose fit is designed to give you some room through the shoulders, chest and body for easy comfort on and off your board. Smiles all round.

title: Jordan
description: You can do what you want when you're poppin'. So wear this varsity-inspired tee whenever and wherever you like.

title: Jordan Hex Mule
description: Angling for a sportier mule? The Jordan Hex Mule uses the same edgy design made iconic by the Hex Slide to bring a closed-toe option perfect for the changing seasons.

title: Nike Bella Kai
description: The Bella Kai delivers the underfoot comfort of dual-density foam in a casual flip-flop, ideal for all-day wear in warm weather. Soft, lined straps provide a secure fit, while the herringbone texture on the footbed and outsole add grip instead of slip.

title: Nike Air Max Solo
description: This modern interpretation of classic elements is perfect for the Air Max super-fan. Layer up in breathable mesh and plush synthetic leathers, with a heel cup inspired by the AM90. The AM180 influences the textured Air unit, which delivers just the right amount of cushioning. Go ahead—Max out your look.

title: Air Jordan 1 Elevate Low
description: Rise to the occasion in style that soars. This shoe reworks an icon's original magic with a platform sole and low-cut silhouette. Air cushioning keeps you lifted, and sleek leather in contrasting colours adds visual interest.

title: Nike Dunk Low Next Nature
description: Created for the hardwood but taken to the streets, the '80s b-ball icon returns with classic details and throwback hoops flair. Now made with at least 20% recycled materials by weight, it lets you do good by looking good.

title: Nike Air Huarache Craft
description: When it fits this good and looks this great, there's no question—you're leading the charge. From its stretchy, foot-hugging fabric to its sporty, supportive heel cage, the Huarache Craft remasters everything you love best about the iconic shoe. Plus, its plush foam midsole and incredibly soft upper give your feet bragging rights.

title: Nike Air Max 97
description: Push your style into the future with the Air Max 97. Rippled design lines give this iconic sneaker a sleek and fast-paced look. Contrasting pops of colour over a neutral base provide a classic street style to ensure these kicks turn heads. And, of course, we kept the full-length Nike Air cushioning—letting you capture the spotlight in comfort.

title: Nike Air Force 1 Sculpt
description: Tick all the boxes in the AF-1 Sculpt. Refined details like the pared-down collar (notice there's no ankle strap) streamline the iconic hoops shoe and bring the comfort. The recessed Swoosh makes a luxe statement, while slightly textured leather creates a classic look. Finishing it off, easy-to-style colours make them ideal for any outfit.

title: Nike Air Max Sol
description: Bring bold sneaker style to sunny days in the Air Max Sol. Its large foam midsole and exposed Air unit play off streetwear favourites and deliver lightweight comfort you can take from the beach to the town. The mesh in the upper keeps it airy, while adjustable straps and buckles let you personalise your fit. Strap in—it's time for fun.

title: Nike Air Max 90 G NRG
description: The icon you know and love makes its way to the golf course to blend style with performance. It brings back mainstays like the Max Air cushioning and moulded elements. We updated the Waffle outsole to give you grip for the course, and a thin overlay helps keep water out. With purplish and orange hues spread throughout, this version has hints of the Grand Canyon state's glowing spring skies.

title: Roshe G Next Nature
description: When the sun's beating down your back and your drive just landed in the bunker, lean into the Roshe 2, a design that can help you find your peace when your round isn't going your way. It's inherently simple and stylish, breathable and comfortable, perfect for playing in those sizzling-hot months. A full mesh upper and a soft, lightweight foam midsole form a cushioned combination to help maintain your internal calm, even if your game goes in the gutter.

title: Nike Free Run 5.0
description: Made from at least 20% recycled material by weight, the sock-like boot of this Nike Free is designed to transition from running to training to your everyday routine. With a breathable knit upper, it combines the flexibility you love with a secure design that will help keep you close to the ground for that barefoot feeling. New cushioning is lighter, softer and more responsive than previous versions so you can keep moving in comfort whether you're on the tarmac or track.

title: Nike SuperRep Cycle 2 Next Nature
description: Designed to be more breathable than its predecessor, the Nike SuperRep Cycle 2 Next Nature lets you work towards your next PR during high-heat, fast-paced indoor cycling. An improved adjustable strap helps secure your feet during intense movement.

title: Nike Winflo 9
description: The Winflo 9 gives you the support you need to match your speed. It has a secure fit that keeps your foot in place as the miles go by. We added plenty of foam through the midsole, giving you extra pep to every step. Lace up, lock in, win your goals.

title: Cosmic Unity 3
description: Better for your game, designed with sustainability in mind—2 things you care about—the Cosmic Unity 3 has a secure, lightweight design for a low-to-the-ground feel. It gives you cloud-like cushioning for explosive speed and quick changes of direction, the difference-makers in a game that's becoming more extraterrestrial.

title: Nike Zegama
description: Navigate the up and downs of uncompromising terrain with the Nike Zegama. Developed with great grip and stability, it has you covered, so you can keep climbing and reach greater personal heights when the going gets grimy and gritty. Whether it's a challenging, rocky landscape going uphill or a steep, slick decline down a treacherous trail, feel confident when you decide to off-road it.

title: Nike Metcon 8 AMP
description: You chase the clock, challenging and encouraging each other all in the name of achieving goals and making gains. Our go-to model for training relies on a lighter, more breathable upper than our previous edition to complement our standards of durability and comfort, so that you can float through your cardio, power through your lifts and dominate your workouts. Warm neutrals are inviting and inclusive as we take a sunny approach to a school-is-out-for summer sort of nostalgia on this special design.

title: Nike Alphafly 2
description: Once you take a few strides in the Nike Alphafly 2, you'll never look at your favourite pair of old racing shoes the same way again. These rocket ships are made to help shave precious time off your personal records without surrendering the foundation you need to go the full distance. A thick, lightweight support system marries the 2 worlds of comfort and speed in holy running matrimony. Enjoy the greatest energy return of all our racing shoes while you chase your personal bests and leave the competition in the dust.

title: Jordan Why Not .6 PF
description: Russell Westbrook's 6th signature shoe is—you guessed it—all about speed. To get you goin' as fast as possible, we've wrapped the rubber outsole nearly up to the midsole, so you're not gonna slip when you explode from 0 to 100. Added security comes from the interior bootie that keeps you strapped in as you jet across the court. It's all held together by an outer shroud and fastened with a zip collar that spells out Russell's signature question: "Why Not?"

title: Nike Vomero 16
description: The Vomero 16 adds responsive ZoomX foam cushioning, bringing an energetic pop to your stride that's perfect for high mileage on the road. It's super-lightweight, with plenty of stretch and ventilation through the upper. Looking for the right amount of support? We've got you covered with an adjustable midfoot band and a stable clip at the heel.

title: Nike Juniper Trail 2
description: Break away from the norm and dash up that tempting trail in the Nike Juniper Trail 2. Durable material on the top and tough traction on the bottom give you a consistent, confident ride for those off-road runs calling your name. It's built for earthy terrain and unbeaten paths, with reliable traction that'll help keep you on course.
colour: Light Photo Blue/Plum Eclipse/Vivid Sulphur/Track Red

title: Jordan Stadium 90
description: Comfort is king, but that doesn't mean you have to sacrifice style. Taking design inspiration from the AJ1 and AJ5, the Stadium 90 is ready for everyday wear. The upper is made from leather and airy woven, so you get both breathability and durability, and Nike Air cushioning in the sole keeps your every step light and cushioned.

title: Nike Air Flight Huarache
description: Nobody does basketball like us, and no one brings 'em back like we do. Straight from the vault, the Air Flight Huarache transports you to the height of the hoops-to-street revolution. It scratches your itch for hoops nostalgia with LA colours and collar cut-outs. But not everything new is old: Nike Air cushioning brings an iconic design into the future.

title: Nike Fly.By Mid 3
description: Cushioning, ankle support and traction are essential on the basketball court. The Nike Fly.By Mid 3 delivers exactly what's needed to help players excel on offence and defence. Designed to look as comfortable as it feels, the mid-top sneaker has plush, energy-returning foam to help keep you fresh through four quarters.

title: Nike Metcon 9 By You
description: Ensure all your hard work shines in and out of the gym in the Nike Metcon 9 By You. Chrome out your design in certain areas, like the heel clips and Swoosh logos, then make your way to the rope wrap, where graphic options and translucent colours await. Choose from a spectrum of colours to make your upper as unique as your mind's eye and the gains you plan to make in your workouts.

title: Jordan ADG 4
description: A request from MJ himself, the Jordan ADG 4 infuses an incredibly classic silhouette with retro Jordan flavour. Supple, full-grain leather shows off the iconic elephant print on the heel. The rubber sole has an integrated traction pattern that perfectly pairs the grip you need with the versatility and comfort you want.

title: Nike Gripknit Phantom GX Elite AG By You
description: Obsessed with perfecting your craft and on-the-pitch look? We design Elite boots for you and the world's biggest stars to give you high-level quality, because you demand greatness from yourself and your footwear. Infused with revolutionary Nike Gripknit, this boot provides better touch on the ball in an intuitive design that's made to optimise performance both when striking and during close control. Make your own style with a ridiculously extensive palette of colour options and hit the pitch with full creative control.

title: NikeCourt Air Zoom Lite 3
description: At 1st glance, the Nike Zoom Court Lite 3 looks like a classic tennis shoe. Look closer and you'll find that it's anything but. With a springy Zoom Air unit, grippy outsole and an incredibly comfortable, padded collar, it delivers the performance you need to play at your best. We shifted the traditional leather to a cleaner, more minimal finish to help keep you light on your feet.

title: Nike Air Force 1 Mid '07
description: The Nike Air Force 1 Mid '07 is everything you know best: '80s construction, smooth leather and nothing-but-net style. Plus, we're taking it up a notch with a padded, mid-cut collar with an adjustable strap.

title: Nike Club
description: When your outfit needs that final touch, that last pop of colour to pull everything together, the Nike Club cap answers the call. A classic 6-panel layout and soft, unstructured design brings casual comfort you can rock all day. Don't think twice—Just Do It.

title: Nike Air Penny 2
description: Flash back to '96 in the Air Penny 2. Bold and unmistakable, it was the first Air Penny to combine Max and Zoom Air technology. Now, the daring design comes wrapped in patent leather, while the signature 1 Cent logo on the side and the wavy design lines keep the coveted off-court appeal strong.

title: Nike Everyday Plus
description: With sweat-wicking technology that helps to keep your feet feeling dry and comfortable, these socks have cushioning on the forefoot and heel to add extra comfort during that last mile or final rep.

title: LeBron Witness 7 EP
description: The longer LeBron's legendary career continues, the more his game needs a design that doesn't weigh him down yet can still control all that sublime power. So, we've created our lightest LeBron model but with the kind of bankable support that can help you stay in front of your opponent with the game on the line. Full-length Max Air cushioning helps you take off and land confidently, while lightweight mesh blends with containment cables to help keep you locked in for four quarters or more. This version is made for outdoor court use with its extra-durable rubber outsole.

title: Nike Everyday Plus
description: Your love of the iconic Air Max shoe doesn't just have to live through your sneakers—your socks can rep too. We paired the love of Air Max with a fun take on the old-school varsity vibe, with block Nike lettering, classic striping and the winged Swoosh logo. Featuring sweat-wicking technology for long-lasting dry comfort and a banded arch for snug support, you'll be flying all day long.

title: Nike Air VaporMax 2023 Flyknit
description: Have you ever walked on Air? Step into the Air VaporMax 2023 to see how it's done. The innovative tech is revealed through the perforated sockliner (pull it out to see more). The stretchy Flyknit upper is made from at least 20% recycled content by weight.

title: Nike Heritage
description: An alternative to the classic hip pack style, the Nike Heritage Cross-Body Bag offers hands-free storage in a design you wear across the chest. A Futura logo print and easy-to-adjust strap make it a smart pick for everyday use. The main storage pocket and accessories pocket help keep your gear organised. This product is made from at least 65% recycled polyester.

title: Jordan
description: Add some comfort to your style with these no-show socks. Sweat-wicking power and breathability help keep your feet dry and cool so you can push you through your day with full force.

title: Nike Hoops Elite
description: Wherever your game takes you, take the gear you need to succeed. The Nike Hoops Elite Duffel Bag has plenty of room for all the gear you need on and off the court, including a ventilated zipped bottom compartment to store your favourite pair of sneakers. Throw it onto your shoulder or grab the dual handles and get going to your favourite local court to swish that half-court shot.

title: Tiger Woods
category: Structured Nike Dri-FIT ADV Club Cap
description: Tiger Woods' CV speaks for itself: major tournament victories, countless key putts and an impact on the game that will last long past his retirement. Show love to the GOAT with our Nike Club cap. This structured mid-depth design features advanced sweat-wicking fabric to help you stay cool on and off the course. It's stretchy, breathable and features Tiger's logo on the front.

title: Nike Brasilia 9.5
description: The Nike Brasilia Duffel Bag keeps all your training gear—and more—at hand. A side compartment stores shoes separately, while inner and outer pockets help you stay organised. Use it for a trip to the gym or away for the weekend. We've got you covered. This product is made from at least 65% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike Club
description: Pull on our Nike Club cap and get groovy. This tie-dye iteration of our classic, unstructured dad hat brings a bold pattern to any outfit. The soft cotton twill and 6-panel design keep your look as casual as the far-out finish.

title: Nike J
description: Designed to take the impacts of the game, the Nike J Shinguards are made from a tough composite shell and feature perforations for ventilated comfort.

title: Nike Everyday Plus Cushioned
description: Sometime a no-show is a good thing. These lightweight socks blend sweat-wicking tech with a breathable design to help keep your feet dry and cool from warm-ups to a long workday—all while staying hidden.

title: Nike Offline 3.0
description: Put the world on pause in the Nike Offline 3.0 Mule. The ribbed insole massages your foot, helping to keep you refreshed and relaxed. The padded, bootie-like upper with quilted fabric feels soft and airy. And wavy edges around the midsole mimic the calm movement of water. We think it's OK to do nothing—just do it comfortably.

title: Nike Everyday
description: Mix these socks to match whatever mood you're in, from peace signs and skateboarding snails to happy mushrooms and sunglasses. No matter what look you choose, these socks are totally bananas.

title: Nike Hoops Elite
description: Take your hoops game to the next level. Plenty of storage helps keep your gear organised, from its spacious main compartment to the zip pockets that store your small essentials. What makes it a slam dunk? A chest strap combined with air units for cushioning on the shoulder straps that provide extra comfort, so it's here to game all day.

title: Giannis Antetokounmpo
description: Fans of Giannis love his multifaceted game, competitive fire and genuine personality. Our unstructured, mid-depth Nike Club cap joins forces with the MVP for this simple design that you can rock on and off the court. Cotton twill wicks away sweat, plus the Freak logo lets the world know you've got the champion's stamp of approval.

title: Nike Everyday Plus Cushioned
description: The Nike Everyday Plus Cushioned Socks bring comfort to your workout with extra cushioning under the heel and forefoot and a snug, supportive arch band. Sweat-wicking power and breathability up top help keep your feet dry and cool to help push you through that extra set.

title: Nike
description: From workouts to getting to work, the Nike Backpack has you covered. A large zipped compartment offers room for shoes or an extra set of clothes for the gym and your books and laptop for school. 2 exterior pockets help keep electronics and small essentials organised and stored securely. This product is made from at least 65% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike Air
description: Show off your love of the brand in this mock-neck top. With a soft feel and cropped fit, an elastic band adds structure to this otherwise breezy silhouette.

title: Nike ACG
description: For adventures, big and small, it's always nice to have some extra room to move. Wider around the leg and a longer length make these stretchy, high-waisted shorts the perfect fit for days when space and comfort are a premium.

title: F.C. Barcelona 2023/24 Stadium Fourth
description: Our Stadium collection pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking technology to give you a game-ready look inspired by your favourite team.

title: Jordan Chicago
description: Clean lines and a touch of utility make these lightweight cargo trousers a go-anywhere fave. Features like ankle ties and an elastic, press-stud waist up the functionality—and the slightly cropped length lets you show off your kicks.

title: Jordan
description: Vintage vibes have arrived. From the silky-smooth material to the chain-stitched "MJ", these mid-rise shorts reinvent retro. Plus, they've got pockets! Inspired by the classic Wings lines, they add a hint of design heritage (and somewhere to put your hands).

title: Nike Dri-FIT Everyday
description: Say hello to the Nike Dri-FIT Everyday House Socks. Designed for those working at home or taking care of their families, sock-to-floor grip provides traction and comfortable yarns have a soft feel for all-day wear.

title: Nike Gym Club
description: Feel the excitement of movement with the Nike duffel. If you're taking it to the gym or a night out, it's got the space you need. A large double zip main compartment stores your gear or clothes, and a smaller front pocket keeps your small essentials organised.

title: Nike Air
description: Keep it cosy and Airy in these fleece shorts. Smooth on the outside, slightly fluffy on the inside, our mid-weight semi-brushed fleece helps keep you cosy while still being breezy. It's a comfy layer to wear year-round, perfect for those tricky in-between temps.

title: Nike Sportswear Collection
category: Women's High-Waisted Reverse French Terry Shorts
description: Flip the script in these roomy shorts. We reversed their soft French terry fabric so the loops are on the outside for an unexpected twist. Unsnap the buttons at the elongated waistband for a sporty look rooted in Nike heritage.

title: Nike Featherlight
description: A favourite returns with the same lightweight design you love. The Nike Featherlight Cap features breathable technology and an adjustable strap to keep you covered and comfortable on your run. This product is made from at least 50% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike Dri-FIT One
category: Women's Standard Fit Long-Sleeve Top (Plus Size)
description: The Nike Dri-FIT One Top is designed for all of the ways you work out—from the machines to the mat to the miles. Soft, smooth fabric (made from 100% recycled polyester fibres) comes in a breathable silhouette to keep you cool and dry.

title: Jordan
description: MAKE THEM LOOK. Sure, we're saying it loud here—but we know how to be subtle, too. This relaxed tee sports your new favourite motto just below the collar, in a font that's just big enough to make you smile when you look in the mirror.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Make waves in this oversized T-shirt dress. Soft, lightweight fabric helps you stay comfy and cool, while a fresh take on tie-dye gives you a one-of-a kind, vibrant look.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Root for Team Nike in this sport-inspired graphic tee. A classic for a reason, the combination of a relaxed fit and soft cotton is an easy win you can count on every day of the year.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Rep your love for sport in this comfy tee. Heavyweight cotton gives you a structured feel while the roomy fit looks relaxed without feeling too big.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Talk about a blast from the past. Rep your love for sport with this asymmetrical design inspired by classic athletics pieces. The water-resistant fabric helps keep you dry in light rain, making this skirt ideal for everyday wear. Complete your look by pairing it with the matching jacket or your favourite top.

title: Nike Dri-FIT One Swoosh
description: Whether you're racking up the miles or jogging to the corner shop, these loose-fitting shorts help keep you feeling cool and confident. Their silky-smooth, ultra-soft woven fabric is balanced with sweat-wicking tech so you have ultimate comfort while feeling dry. And, no need to check your eyes: the double Swoosh graphic on the left leg mimics movement to inspire you to keep going.

title: Nike Alate All U
category: Women's Light-Support Lightly Lined U-Neck Sports Bra
description: Feel effortless as you move through your day in this light-support U-neck bra. The lightweight, sewn-in spacer lining feels breathable while still giving you a little coverage. Moisture-wicking fabric and a low-profile silhouette help keep you cool as you check everything off your list.

title: Nike Pegasus Trail 4 By You
description: Running is your daily ritual, taking you from road to trail as you seek out new adventures and goals. Let the Nike Pegasus Trail 4 take you there and back again with its supportive and springy feel. Underfoot traction keeps you going over rocky terrain, while still providing a smooth ride for the road. Pick from a palette of energetic colours and extensive design options, like 4 different Swoosh logos and multiple iconic Peg Trail designs that make your run pop.
