title: Nike Forward Hoodie
description: Nike Forward catapults your classic hoodie into the future. Unlike traditional knit fabrics, Nike Forward combines multiple thin layers of select fibres for an exceptionally lightweight feel that's effortlessly warm and comfortable. Plus, this first iteration of Nike Forward reduces the carbon footprint by an average of 75% (due to the use of recycled materials, lower process-energy use and lower material density) when used instead of our traditional knit fleece materials. A lighter future is a brighter future. Join us for the journey Forward and let's experience it together.

title: NikeCourt Dri-FIT ADV Slam
description: Our Slam Polo was made to help you rally to greatness. We started with stretchy, breathable fabric so you can move without a hitch. Then we moved the sleeve seams forward, which helps keep your arms free as you slice and smash for the win.

description: This heavyweight Waffle-knit top is thick, durable and brings the comfort to everything you do in life outside of sport. Wear it on its own or comfortably layer it under your favourite flannel, jacket or vest. Get out there and make the most out of your journey.

title: Liverpool F.C. 2023/24 Match Away
category: Men's Nike Dri-FIT ADV Football Shirt
description: Our designers reached into the archives to design the Liverpool F.C. 2023/24 Away shirt, drawing inspiration from a colour-blocked kit first released in '95. Digitised green graphics add a modern look, while a hidden detail on the inside pays tribute to the 97 people who tragically died in the Hillsborough Disaster. Our Match collection pairs authentic design details with lightweight, quick-drying technology to help keep the world's biggest football stars cool and comfortable on the pitch.

title: Nike Dri-FIT
description: Give your body a tune-up when you wear our sweat-wicking top. It comes with soft fleece fabric, a vintage look and a fit like an old favourite. Graphics nod to the Nike Body Shop, setting you up with gear that helps you get the most out of your workouts.

title: Nike Yoga Dri-FIT
description: The Nike Yoga Dri-FIT Jacket is a soft, light layer that keeps you comfortably covered before, during and after your practice. This product is made from at least 75% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Paris Saint-Germain Max90
description: Show everyone who you stand with. Cut for comfort, our roomy PSG Max90 tee gives you a relaxed and casual look so you can cheer on your team in style.

title: Nike Dri-FIT DNA
description: Take care of the future like you take care of the ball in the Nike Dri-FIT DNA Shorts. Made from at least 75% recycled polyester, they offer light, breathable fabric that's tailored for the game.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Starting 5
description: Our Starting 5 Shorts are a nod to 40 years of Nike Force bringing high-flying style to the basketball court. We celebrate the icon with classic graphics over a cool, airy feel and knee-length coverage that helps you stay light on your feet on the court and beyond.

title: F.C. Barcelona 2023/24 Stadium Home
description: Take your team pride to the pitch with our F.C. Barcelona shorts. Our Stadium collection pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking technology to give you a game-ready look inspired by your favourite squad.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Starting 5
description: Celebrate 40 years of Nike Force bringing energy to the court in our Starting 5 Jersey. Smooth, breathable fabric gives you a lightweight feel as you go coast-to-coast on the hardwood. It's an ode to an icon, with a relaxed fit that feels at home on the court and beyond.

title: Jordan Flight MVP
description: Ball through autumn in these easy shorts. They're made from fleece that's smooth on the outside and plush on the inside with a comfy, relaxed fit. Screen-printed graphics keep the look simple but fresh.

title: Nike Life
description: Bringing back the classic front pleats, these chino shorts are built for life and made to last. The relaxed fit gives you some freedom to move and the hem is designed to fall just above the knee.

title: Nike ACG 'Canyon Farer'
description: The ultimate canyon companion, this lightweight ACG 'Canyon Farer' anorak keeps you on the trail and in search of those pristine purple and orange sunset hues. The tough, stretchy woven fabric with reinforced CORDURA® panels helps repel water, so you can stay the course with less restriction. The roomy fit provides a comfy feel through the chest and body. Pack up the pockets or pack the whole jacket into the roomy chest pocket and move your journey forwards. Another canyon sunset awaits.

title: Nike SB
description: This soft, midweight cotton Nike SB tee is cut with some room around the body for casual daily wear. Semi-psychedelic graphics depict the Great Sphinx rocking SB Blazers and an enchanting elephant-man on a journey. A journey we'd love to learn more about. So many questions.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Celebrate tasty waves and casual beach life in this lightweight cotton tee. It's designed to feel relaxed through the shoulders, chest and body for easy comfort and layering. Printed graphics on the chest and back give a vibrant nod to the sun and surf scene.

title: Nike Sportswear Tech Pack
description: These trousers bring the look and durability from yesterday's workwear and pairs them with the comfort and useful details you want from a pair of daily drivers. They're triple-needle stitching with a magnetic buckle closure system, cotton canvas with an articulated fit. Just because you're sending emails all day doesn't mean you're not building something worthwhile.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Strike
description: Step onto the pitch and beyond in our sweat-wicking Strike Top. We designed it to perform like the ones the pros wear on the pitch—light, stretchy and breathable—so you can get the most out of your moves as you dribble, pass and shoot your way to the goal.

title: Nike Dri-FIT
description: Smooth and relaxed, just like every classic tank should be. This one keeps it light and comfortable with an iconic graphic that compels you to go for it.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Wild Run Miler
description: Get inspiration for your daily route from the Nike Dri-FIT Miler Wild Run Top. Lightweight and mobile, it offers a soft feel for your journey. Reflective design elements and graphics inspired by the tempo of your feet as you run give you a little extra motivation to hit your goals. This product is made from 100% recycled polyester fibres.

title: F.C. Barcelona 2023/24 Stadium Fourth
description: Our Stadium collection pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking technology to give you a game-ready look inspired by your favourite team.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Icon

title: Nike Sportswear Tech Pack
description: Clean, comfortable and equipped for your daily outings, these shorts from Nike Tech Pack deliver everything you need and nothing you don't. The unlined design wicks sweat to help you stay dry. Durable woven fabric holds up through daily wear, and the one-of-a-kind dye process brings to life a swirling mix of colours.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Challenger
description: Your run is like a tune-up for your body. Our sweat-wicking Challenger Shorts celebrate that with a bold racing stripe, just like the ones you might see on your neighbour's beloved hot rod. They're lightweight and smooth, with plenty of storage for a key or card.

title: NikeCourt Dri-FIT Slam
description: Step onto the court ready to go the distance in our sweat-wicking NikeCourt Shorts. We made them light and stretchy to keep from holding you back as you run side to side and added a loose, mesh-back panel for a slimmer fit that won't bunch. Plus, they have a pocket that keeps your tennis ball secure, so it won't unexpectedly fall out in the middle of a match.

title: Jordan Flight MVP
description: Utility and comfort for the win. Made from durable ripstop material, these lightweight trousers come equipped with ample storage and a drawstring waistband with elastic at the back for a perfect fit. Subtle Jumpman branding means everyone knows who you're reppin'.

title: Tottenham Hotspur Crest
description: Celebrate your team in the Tottenham Hotspur T-Shirt. It's made from soft fabric for comfort. Signature crest and colours highlight your pride.

title: Nike Dri-FIT ADV Run Division
description: Designed for running, our premium Run Division Shorts help you stay cool and comfortable with advanced sweat-wicking power. They're light and airy, like our racing gear, with a crisp feel that won't bunch with your step. We made these with multiple storage options, including side pockets that are made to not let your items fall out as you run.

title: NikeCourt Dri-FIT
description: Looking to take your tea with a quick game of tennis? This sweat-wicking top serves it up with a relaxed fit and soft feel.

title: Nike Challenger
description: The iconic Nike Challenger Shorts deliver woven comfort with an all-new articulated brief. Mesh details and secure storage give the versatility you want from everyday shorts. This product is made from at least 75% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike Trail Dri-FIT
description: Somewhere out there, adventure awaits. We made this T-shirt with a relaxed, soft feel so you stay comfortable while you encounter the unpaved.

title: Nike
description: Harness the good energy and bring it home in this soft and comfy tee. It offers a relaxed and easy feel for you to tap into when it's time to putt for par. Just remember, it's all in the hips.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Studio '72

title: Nike Pro Dri-FIT

title: F.C. Barcelona Academy Pro
category: Men's Nike Full-Zip Knit Football Jacket
description: Take your skills to the next level with the F.C. Barcelona Academy Pro Jacket. Soft fabric in a streamlined fit pairs with a woven crest to give you comfortable coverage that lets you show your team pride.

title: NikeCourt Dri-FIT Advantage
description: Stretchy and breathable, the NikeCourt Dri-FIT Advantage Top will soon be your go-to for fast, fierce matches. Thanks to a new hybrid neckline, you'll get the look of a V-neck with the comfort of a crew. This product is made from at least 75% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Jordan Dri-FIT Sport Breakfast Club
description: It's tank top season—you ready? This mesh jersey is airy, breathable and enhanced with sweat-wicking technology so you'll stay dry on the court (or in the car or at the festival—you get the idea). Wherever you go, the all-over tie-dye print has you covered in style.

title: Jordan
description: Clean and relaxed. Anything else you need in an everyday tee? Oh yeah—it reps your favourite brand, too.

title: Liverpool F.C. 2023/24 Stadium Away
description: Our designers reached into the archives to design the Liverpool F.C. 2023/24 Away shirt, drawing inspiration from a colour-blocked kit first released in '95. Digitised green graphics add a modern look, while a graphic on the inner pride pays tribute to the 97 people who tragically died in the Hillsborough Disaster. Our Stadium collection pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking technology to give you a game-ready look inspired by your favourite team.

It's all about versatility, arriving ready to play on and off the course with stretchy fabric so you can swing free without a hitch. Bringing along extra tees or a scorecard? title: Nike Solo Swoosh
description: Celebrate the power and simplicity of the Swoosh. This heavyweight long-sleeve cotton top has a stiff drape for a structured, premium look and feel. The roomy fit gives you some extra space through the shoulders, chest and body for laid-back, nostalgic style. title: Nike Dri-FIT
description: Meet the Studio '72 collection. Fun, inclusive and playful—it's made for our everyday athlete who loves sport and gets joy from staying active. This Nike Dri-FIT tee features sweat-wicking jersey fabric to help you stay cool during your favourite activity.

title: Jordan Flight MVP

They're made from soft fleece that's smooth on the outside and plush on the inside for warmth and comfort. Screen-printed graphics and a woven label give your look some standout texture.

title: Jordan Essentials

description: You ready to upgrade your hoodie game? This wardrobe staple is made from soft fleece that's smooth on the outside and plush on the inside. The special wash gives you a unique look that's weathered-looking and ready for anything.

title: Nike Solo Swoosh
description: Bringing you the effortless cool of the Swoosh logo to your wardrobe, these shorts are ready to become the casual companion to all your summer adventures. description: Crafted from breathable, sweat-wicking fabric, our Victory Polo puts a new spin on golf performance. We made this one with a golf-tee print for those moments when you're getting ready to start the course off with your best drive.

title: Jordan Flight MVP
description: Zip up and head out in a jacket that's lightweight enough for a workout and fly enough for a night out. Made from smooth polyester, here's the level up your layer game needs.

title: Johor Darul Ta'zim FC 2022 Stadium Away
description: Like other shirts from our Stadium collection, this one pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking fabric to give you a game-ready look inspired by your favourite team.

title: NikeCourt Dri-FIT Victory
description: Crafted from soft fabric with plenty of stretch, the NikeCourt Dri-FIT Victory Top keeps you comfortable and focused on the win.The updated design blends the feel of raglan sleeves with the look of traditional polo sleeves—providing more room to move.This product is made from 100% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Jordan Essentials
description: Baggy, comfy, cool, what's it to you? This roomy, everyday tee features an all-over tie-dye effect, adding a seasonal touch to your 'fit.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Hyverse
description: We made the sweat-wicking Hyverse Tank to help you get through your hardest of workouts, whether you're going on a quick run, doing reps at the gym or finding your centre on the yoga mat. It's built to handle your best, so give it all you've got.

title: NikeCourt
description: Taking its cues from the layout of a tennis court, the NikeCourt Jacket lets you rep your favourite sport long after your match ends. Its smooth knit fabric and ribbed details create the look and feel of a classic tracksuit jacket. This product is made from 100% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Liverpool F.C. Victory
description: Crafted from breathable sweat-wicking technology, the Liverpool F.C. Victory Polo helps keep you cool and dry, while putting a modern spin on a classic design. A woven crest on the chest flies your team pride.

title: Jordan Essentials
description: Lightweight and ready to go, wherever your day takes you. Made from airy woven nylon, these shorts have side vents for extra breathability.

title: Nike Air
description: Channel your love for Nike Air in this lightweight woven jacket. Water-repellent fabric helps you stay dry and the roomy fit lets you layer up underneath when the summer nights turn chilly. The full-zip design is equipped with bungees on the mid-section and hem to let you adjust your fit and style.

title: Nike Be True
description: Our Be True collection highlights Artist and Designer Zoe Schlacter's expressive, rhythmic embodiment of movement and the fluid motion of sport. Nostalgic 60s hues make a vintage splash, adding flavour to the symbolic Pride flag and paying homage to the trailblazers of the LGBTQIA2S+ communities. Zoe's geometric patterns and swirling graphics embrace and represent the full spectrum of being, letting you reclaim the past, revel in the present and re-imagine the future. The jacquard collar and printed graphics pulse with energy, celebrating the power of the global LGBTQIA2S+ community.

title: Nike ESC
description: This woven outdoor shirt effectively harmonises utility and luxury, creating styling options you can pair up or down with ease.

title: NOCTA
description: The Turks and Caicos Spring Break pack, inspired by Drake's favourite holiday spot, celebrates the notion of getting away with friends and sending regards to those left behind.

title: Nike Pro Dri-FIT Flex Vent Max
description: Made from lightweight, stretchy fabric, the Nike Pro Flex Shorts move with your body through your most intense workouts. An elastic, fold-over waistband lets you easily adjust your fit and the sweat-wicking technology helps you stay dry, so you can zero in on the challenges ahead. This product is made from at least 75% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Jordan Jumpman
description: Rise above the ordinary. This light and soft tee is upgraded with sweat-wicking tech, keeping you fresh through all your workouts and hangouts.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Wild Run Challenger
description: The wild beckons. Answer the call in the Nike Challenger Wild Run Shorts. They feature the same sweat-wicking fabric and articulated brief you love with details highlighting the tempo of your feet as they hit their stride. This product is made from at least 75% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Liverpool F.C. Sport Essentials Windrunner
description: The Liverpool Windrunner Jacket combines team pride with Nike's legendary 26-degree chevron design that's defined Windrunner style for decades. Lightweight fabric and a mesh lining give you comfortable coverage all season long.

title: Nike Sportswear Premium Essentials
description: The Nike Sportswear Premium Essentials T-Shirt has a loose fit for a carefree, comfortable look. Its heavyweight organic cotton fabric feels thick and soft. This product is made from at least 75% organic cotton fibres.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Made from soft, lightweight cotton in a relaxed fit for easy comfort, this Nike tee has our Futura logo printed on the chest to let you show some love for the Swoosh.

title: Nike Sportswear Air
description: With an embroidered graphic celebrating one of history's most influential sneaker franchises, this French terry fleece crew is all about pairing comfort with style. Raglan sleeves and a roomy fit through the chest and body pair up with soft ribbing on the collar, cuffs and hem for a clean, comfortable finish. Pull it on and stay true to the powerful history and culture of Air.

title: Nike Sportswear Sport Essentials
description: Whether you're running to the nearest food van or diving into your favourite swimming spot, these varsity-inspired shorts are a good idea. Lined for comfort, the smooth woven fabric is lightweight and lends itself to adventures of all kinds.

description: Umar Rashid (Frohawk Two Feathers) brings his distinctive illustrations to this luxe hoodie. His Artist Series collection is "all about flight and tenacity", showcasing his signature style—imagery that constructs alternative historical narratives, referencing a collection of cultures to collapse geography and time.

title: Ja Morant Memphis Grizzlies 2023 Select Series
category: Men's Nike Dri-FIT NBA Swingman Jersey
description: All-Star. Certified bucket. Future Hall of Famer? Our Select Series honours Ja Morant as a superstar in the making. The distinctive dyed design of this jersey is unique to Ja, celebrating everything that makes him 1 of 1 on the court.

title: Air Jordan Wordmark
description: Sometimes less is more. Bundle up in this premium Jordan hoodie made from plush, heavyweight fleece. It serves straightforward quality—and the serious style your wardrobe requires.

title: Nike Pro Dri-FIT
description: The Nike Pro Dri-FIT Tights hug you with lightweight fabric that helps you feel dry, cool and supported from warm-ups through to cool-downs. They're made from at least 75% recycled polyester fibres in a stretchy design that helps you move at full intensity during your toughest workouts or competitions.

title: Nike Club
category: Men's Woven All-Over Print Flow Shorts
description: Made from lightweight woven fabric, these Flow shorts are a warm-weather staple, designed to fall above the knee. Lined with mesh, they're an easy pick for activity under the sun. Plus, this version has an all-over print that highlights several generations of Nike brand marks, from our old-school script logo to the classic Futura. Pair them up with your favourite Nike sneakers and celebrate 50 years of game-changing greatness.

title: Nike ACG
description: Breathe in that fresh air with this spacious, soft tee. It feels like a classic, with a slightly baggy fit. And when you're out enjoying the great outdoors, the lung-shaped graphic reminds you to stop, breathe and take in the scenery. This product is made from 100% sustainable materials, using a blend of both recycled polyester and organic cotton fibres. The blend is at least 10% recycled fibres or at least 10% organic cotton fibres.

title: Liverpool F.C. Strike
category: Men's Nike Dri-FIT Knit Football Top
description: With design details specifically tailored for football's rising stars, a slim, streamlined fit ensures that nothing comes between you and the ball. Sweat-wicking technology helps keep you cool and composed while you fine-tune your skills.

title: Nike Dri-FIT LeBron
description: 20 years of LeBron on the court, 20 years of striving for and achieving greatness. We honour that legacy with the graphics on this soft and smooth T-shirt.

description: We made these sweat-wicking shorts with insights from Rafael Nadal and athlete data to determine where you need more breathability and stretch. Plus, they're light enough so you can keep going for it with every slice and swing.

description: Every team has its true colours, an unmistakable identity that sets it apart from the rest of the league. Honouring a rich hoops heritage, this Brooklyn Nets jersey is inspired by what the pros wear on the hardwood, from squad details to lightweight, sweat-wicking mesh. It helps keep you dry and cool on or off the court while you rep your favourite player and the game you love.

description: Every team has its true colours, an unmistakable identity that sets it apart from the rest of the league. It helps keep you dry and cool on or off the court while you rep your favourite player and the game you love.

title: Nike Club
description: Pull on these comfy woven shorts and find your flow. A soft elastic waistband with an external drawcord helps you find the right fit, so you can stay comfortable from sunrise til sunset.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Run Division
description: For runs short or long, we offer the sweat-wicking coverage of our Run Division Tee. It's lightweight, soft and relaxed to allow you to focus on the journey ahead.

title: Nike AeroSwift
description: The Nike AeroSwift Shorts keep you ready for your race with a lightweight design.Sweat-wicking technology and a ventilated waistband help keep you dry and cool on the go.This product is made from at least 75% recycled polyester fibres.

description: Pay tribute to Team 31—aka the NBA—in this Nike Dri-FIT NBA T-Shirt. It's a lightweight, softly knit tee with sweat-wicking technology.

description: This isn't your average polo—it's The Nike Polo. Every detail, from its innovative, sweat-wicking fabric to the hints of orange that nod to Nike's original shoe box, has been thoughtfully crafted to meet the needs of the everyday you. The result is a street-ready style that looks as at home on the course or court as it does everywhere else. To top it off, this product is made with 100% sustainable materials, using a blend of both recycled polyester and organic cotton fibres.

description: Made from durable Ripstop fabric in a roomy, skate-ready fit, these Nike SB trousers are built to last. The classic cargo design doesn't skimp on storage. title: Nike Dri-FIT UV Run Division Miler

description: Built for running, training and yoga, our Unlimited shorts help keep you moving throughout the year. With an 18cm (approx.) inseam, they're here for whatever your workout requires. Part of the Studio '72 collection, this playful chameleon print is designed for those who get joy out of staying active.

title: Jordan Essentials
description: Feel fresh all season in this lightweight jacket. Woven material with a mesh lining and minimal branding ensures the look is on point.

description: Our Slam Polo was made to help you rally to greatness. We started with stretchy, breathable fabric so you can move without a hitch. Then we moved the sleeve seams forward, which helps keep your arms free as you slice and smash for the win.

description: The Nike Dri-FIT Stride Shorts have a lightweight feel designed for unrestricted movement. title: Los Angeles Lakers Icon Edition 2022/23
description: Every team has its true colours, an unmistakable identity that sets it apart from the rest of the league. Honouring a rich hoops heritage, this Los Angeles Lakers jersey is inspired by what the pros wear on the hardwood, from squad details to lightweight, sweat-wicking mesh. It helps keep you dry and cool on or off the court while you rep your favourite player and the game you love.

Gold accents throughout are paired with hidden details to commemorate the team's unrivalled 4 world championships. Like the other shirts in our Stadium collection, this one pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking technology to give you a game-ready look inspired by the Stars and Stripes.

title: Jordan Essentials
description: Gear up in all-day versatility, utility and a touch of Jordan heritage. They're made from durable twill with distinct stitch lines that hook back to the brand's iconic Flight Suit. Multiple cargo pockets keep your essentials close at hand.

title: Nike F.C.
description: Light and smooth, just like your moves on the pitch, our sweat-wicking F.C. tee is designed for comfort on and off the pitch.

title: Nike Miler
category: Men's Dri-FIT UV Long-Sleeve Running Top
description: Whether you're starting out in exercise or continuing your daily habit, this lightweight Nike Miler top is the perfect running partner. title: Nike Sportswear
description: Clean and crisp with stylised Nike graphics, this lightweight cotton tee is perfect for casual, everyday wear. It's designed to feel relaxed through the chest and body for an athletic fit you can layer.

description: Layer up to stand out. This top features sweatshirt sleeves and a hood attached to a mesh jersey for a two-piece look without the bulk. Embroidered graphics and a woven label add some subtle spice.

description: Modern utility meets comfort in these essential trousers. Diamond-shaped cargo pockets reference iconic Jordan design lines and give you extra room for all your must-have stuff. And to get that perfect fit, you've got an elastic waistband, button fly and belt loops, plus bungees with adjustable toggles at the cuffs.

A graffiti-inspired accent on the sleeves is paired with a deconstructed England graphic on the insides to give this throwback design a modern feel. Like other shirts in our Stadium collection, this one pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking technology to give you a game-ready look inspired by the Lionesses

title: Jordan Flight MVP
description: Fresh and zesty, this tee makes any day a bit cooler. Made of soft and comfortable cotton, it features an all-over print inspired by vintage Jordan designs.

title: Nike Dri-FIT
description: Your off-road adventure gets a little more comfortable with this relaxed and soft tee. The fabric wicks sweat, so the top won't cling to you when your trail run heats up.

description: Like other shirts from our Stadium collection, this one pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking fabric to give you a game-ready look inspired by your favourite team.

description: Welcome the Nike Apex Bucket into your line-up. The mid-depth design is made from soft cotton and features an embroidered Futura logo for a clean Nike finish. The wash treatment softens the feel and gives it a vintage look that keeps ageing to perfection the more you wear it.

description: Mix these socks to match whatever mood you're in, from peace signs and skateboarding snails to happy mushrooms and sunglasses. No matter what look you choose, these socks are totally bananas.

Featuring sweat-wicking technology for long-lasting dry comfort and a banded arch for snug support, you'll be flying all day long.

title: Nike Club
description: A classic mid-depth cap with plenty of styling options, this Nike Club Cap comes in smooth cotton twill that has a soft wash for easy comfort from day 1. The pre-curved bill lends itself to casual styling, and the adjustable back-strap lets you find the right fit.

title: Jordan Club Cap
description: You new everyday dad hat has landed. This six-panel design features an unstructured, low-profile crown, curved brim and adjustable snapback closure. It's all brought together with an understated Jumpman graphic on the front.

title: Jordan Flight MVP 85
description: Fly high in this all-over print tee. It's made from 100% cotton in a relaxed fit—just throw it on and soar.

title: Nike Hoops Elite
description: The name says it all. Premium touches, like densely woven material, an extended zip pull and ventilation holes in the main compartment, add to the classic Hoops Elite graphic. Don't forget the front zip pocket and the easy-close drawstring, so you can head to the court and start getting buckets.

title: Jordan Flight Heritage
description: Get cosy without looking scruffy. This super-soft fleece hoodie has an all-over wash for a nice worn-in look. The hood itself features a zip that lets you open it up and show off your Jordan pride. The embroidered Jumpman on the chest brings the whole look together.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: The Nike Sportswear Top has an easy fit and a clean design perfect for everyday wear. Its jersey fabric is made from 100% sustainable materials, using a blend of recycled polyester, recycled cotton and organic cotton fibres. The blend is at least 10% recycled fibres or at least 10% organic cotton fibres.

title: Nike Heritage
description: Make a statement at your next big event with the Nike Hip Pack. Featuring a large compartment to hold your phone, ticket and other necessities, this pack is adjustable for a perfect fit.

title: Zion
description: Keep it breezy this summer season in these bold mesh shorts. The lightweight material helps you stay cool while fire Zion graphics keep your look on lock.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Heavyweight and wild, this Nike tee brings the premium goods to any outfit. The dropped shoulders, longer sleeves and spacious cut offer a relaxed, comfortable fit.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: The Nike Sportswear Trousers bring a classic up to speed. The smooth woven fabric features a clean look accented only by a small embroidered Futura logo on the left leg. Elastic cuffs provide a comfortable feel and ensure your sneakers shine.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Academy
description: Step onto the pitch with the smooth and stretchy coverage of our sweat-wicking Academy Top. It's your go-to for training and beyond, with breathable panels to help you stay cool when your drills heat up. Discreet thumbholes let you extend coverage while keeping the sleeves in place and your hands warm—so you can pass, dribble and shoot without anything holding you back.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Starting 5
description: Our Starting 5 Shorts are a nod to 40 years of Nike Force bringing high-flying style to the basketball court. We celebrate the icon with classic graphics over cool, airy fabric and above-the-knee coverage that helps you stay light on your feet on the court and beyond.

title: Nike Dri-FIT
description: Made from soft, lightweight jersey fabric with sweat-wicking technology, this tee feels comfy against your skin whether working out or chilling out.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Totality

title: Nike Dri-FIT Miler
description: Get those extra miles in with a top that won't hold you up. Our sweat-wicking Miler Tank returns with a longer body and ultra-lightweight fabric, so you get more coverage without the weight. It's cool and breathable, with a relaxed fit that won't slow you down.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Studio '72

colour: Deep Royal Blue/Deep Royal Blue/Safety Orange/Safety Orange

title: Nike Hoops Elite
description: Wherever your game takes you, take the gear you need to succeed. The Nike Hoops Elite Duffel Bag has plenty of room for all the gear you need on and off the court, including a ventilated zipped bottom compartment to store your favourite pair of sneakers. Throw it onto your shoulder or grab the dual handles and get going to your favourite local court to swish that half-court shot.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Club
description: From work to workout and everywhere in-between, this Nike Club Cap is versatile enough for all your needs. The structured, mid-depth design features sweat-wicking fabric to help you stay cool through everything. title: Tiger Woods

It's stretchy, breathable and features Tiger's logo on the front.

title: Giannis Antetokounmpo
description: Fans of Giannis love his multifaceted game, competitive fire and genuine personality. Our unstructured, mid-depth Nike Club cap joins forces with the MVP for this simple design that you can rock on and off the court. title: Nike Everyday Plus Cushioned
description: The Nike Everyday socks are dip-dyed to satisfy your desire to add a little extra fun to your workout. As comfortable as they are colourful, this easy-fitting crew is powered by Dri-FIT to keep you comfortable while you sweat it out.

title: Nike Dri-FIT
description: Our sweat-wicking tee keeps it smooth and comfortable while celebrating the Swoosh with a woven graphic on the chest and an oversized graphic on the back.

title: Nike Unlimited

title: Jordan Flight Heritage 85

Sweat-wicking technology helps to keep you cool and dry no matter where your next adventure takes you.

title: Nike Dri-FIT UV Hyverse

title: Nike Heritage

title: Nike Dri-FIT ADV Club
description: From work to workout and everywhere in-between, this Nike Club Cap is versatile enough for all your needs. title: Tottenham Hotspur 2023/24 Stadium Home

An all-over line-work pattern inspired by the borough's vibrant music scene and streetwear culture adds fresh energy to the Spurs' classic white. (Of course, we kept the white.) Our Stadium collection pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking technology to give you a game-ready look inspired by your favourite team.

title: Rafa
category: Men's Nike Dri-FIT ADV Short-Sleeve Tennis Top
description: Play like Rafa in this sweat-wicking top. We used athlete data to determine where you need more breathability and stretch and designed this top. The result is a top that's innovated to perform at all levels of play.

title: Jordan Club Cap
description: You new everyday dad hat has landed. This six-panel design features an unstructured, low-profile crown, curved brim and adjustable snapback closure. It's all brought together with an understated Jumpman graphic on the front.

title: Nike Heritage
description: Throw your style back to those vintage days when you're heading out. The main compartment features a double zip, so accessing all of your gear is easier than ever. A smaller pocket on the back helps keep important items like your keys or wallet secure while you're on the go. Whether it's slung over your shoulder or clasped around your waist, this hip pack's adjustable strap provides plenty of carrying options for you to pick from.

description: Designed for running, training and yoga, our sweat-wicking Challenger Shorts keep it light and breathable with a relaxed fit that helps you get the most out of your movement. We geared them for more than running, with a comfortable pocket that won't irritate when you move from the track to the gym.

title: NOCTA Turks and Caicos
description: Get away in this breezy collection by NOCTA. Inspired by the endless beaches and incredible sunsets of Drake's favourite holiday destination, each piece draws from the turquoise waters and white-sand beaches of Turks and Caicos. This light, double-knit jersey helps keep you dry and comfortable, while crafted details and a NOCTA graphic bring the energy. Send your regards and … distant regards.

title: Nike Sportswear Tech Pack
description: Enjoy the sun without getting cooked in this versatile button-down. Designed to keep you more comfortable in a variety of conditions, the fabric sheds water and UV rays on the trail and in the wilderness. A subtle Tech Pack look helps you be just as comfortable if you style it up for a chill evening out.

title: Nike ACG 'Snowgrass'
description: Keep taking your outdoor journey to new horizons in the mid-weight feel of our Nike ACG 'Snowgrass' Shorts. Made from breathable, water-repellent fabric, they have an adjustable belt and plenty of secure pockets for holding all your outdoor essentials. The roomy fit is designed to give you some comfortable space through the seat and thighs for easy movement on and off the trail.

title: Nike Pro Dri-FIT Vent Max
description: Made from soft, stretchy fabric, the Nike Vent Max Trousers help you move freely before, during and after your workout. A tapered design reduces distractions, so you can focus on powering through your lifts and drills. And, they're mindfully made from at least 75% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Jordan
description: These ankle socks will keep you dry and cool with sweat-wicking fabric and breathable ankle panels. They're snug around the arch to give you that extra-supportive feel.

title: Nike ACG
description: For rainy hikes or sunny adventures, the Nike ACG Bucket Hat keeps you covered.It's lightweight and comfortable, with a low-key chin strap for on-the-go adjustments.

title: Nike Heritage
description: With classic style on display, the Nike Hip Pack is small but mighty. It has a sizeable compartment for all the essentials when bulky bags won't work. The adjustable strap features 2 clips on each end. Bonus: The zip on this bag features a Swoosh logo pull, giving it an iconic touch.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Challenger
description: Designed for running, training and yoga, our sweat-wicking Challenger Shorts keep it light and right with a relaxed over-layer and under-layer tights for support that helps you get the most out of your movement. We geared them for more than running, with a comfortable pocket that won't irritate when you move from the track to the gym.

title: Jordan Dri-FIT Sport
description: You're ready to go for the full 18 in this soft pique polo. Lightweight fabric enhanced with sweat-wicking tech helps keep you dry through the whole course, and with thoughtful details like the embroidered Jumpman and raglan sleeves, your look will pop on and off the green.

title: Nike Max90
description: Making hot shots when it matters most? Then you must be a big game hooper. Suit up in this roomy tee, with badges celebrating those moments of court superiority.

title: Nike Solo Swoosh
description: Celebrate the power and simplicity of the Swoosh. This warm fleece crew is made with some extra room through the shoulders, chest and body for easy comfort and laid-back, nostalgic style. Stretchy ribbed openings help hold the crew in place when you move and seal in your body heat when the weather cools.

title: Nike Pro Dri-FIT
description: Much more than a base layer, the Nike Pro Dri-FIT Shorts hug you with lightweight fabric that keeps you feeling dry, cool and supported from warm-ups through to cool-downs. They're made from at least 75% recycled polyester fibres in a stretchy design that helps you move at full intensity during your toughest workouts or competitions.

title: Nike Dri-FIT ADV AeroSwift
description: You've pushed through the worst to compete with the best. So, let the breathable feel of the Nike Dri-FIT ADV AeroSwift Vest take you across the finish. Lightweight and silky smooth, the vest uses our most innovative technologies to get you to your personal best. This product is made with at least 75% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Jordan Essentials
description: Sittin' courtside or poolside, this tee gets it. Printed on classic cotton, a big and bold Jumpman gets a summery update.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Challenger
description: Step up and take on your run in soft comfort. The Nike Dri-FIT Challenger Trousers are made with details like sweat-wicking technology and press studs to keep your gear close. A tapered fit means they won't get in your way. This product is made from 100% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Zion
description: Rep your favourite baller while keepin' it classic. The Zion logo is screen-printed on 100% cotton—what else could you need?

title: Jordan Flight MVP
description: Rep #23, 23 different ways. Press studs keep the look breezy while a fold-down collar gives you that distinction you deserve. The all-over print is the star here—you can't miss it.

title: NOCTA Souvenir Cactus
description: Pack this bootleg-inspired souvenir tee from NOCTA in your suitcase, head for the islands and send your "Distant Regards". Perfectly imperfect graphics will leave them scratching their heads.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Miler
description: Our sweat-wicking Miler Jacket celebrates the run as a tune-up for your body. A lightweight, water-repellent design keeps you dry as you get the most out of your route and beyond.

title: Nike Everyday Plus
description: Stay focused and comfortable. These socks feature sweat-wicking technology to keep your feet dry and comfortable whether you're hitting the treadmill or running an errand.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Phenom Elite
description: Step out in our lightweight, Phenom Elite Trousers. We know you're out there giving your all, so we keep you feeling comfortable with buttery smooth, sweat-wicking fabric. Plus, there's pockets for your phone, keys or anything else you need.

title: Nike Air Classic99
description: The Nike Air Classic99 Cap is the perfect complement to your favourite Nike Air styles. A lightweight woven fabric offers a cool, comfortable feel, while a classic Nike Air patch helps show love for the brand.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Run Division Rise 365
description: A warm breeze meets cool speed in this sweat-wicking Rise 365 Tank. It's a spin on our racing vest with a relaxed, lightweight and breathable feel for those hot runs. We gave it the Run Division treatment with reflective-design elements and a pouch pocket that lets you pack the shirt away when you need to layer down.

title: Nike Hike
description: Get outdoor-ready with the Nike Hike Backpack, a versatile bag that can go from storing school gear to day hiking on your local trail. A large main compartment makes storage simple, and a zip front pocket keeps your small gear easy to access. Extra support lives in the padded shoulder straps that are adjustable and feature an adjustable sternum clasp to help distribute the weight while you walk.

title: Jordan 23 Engineered
description: Everyday utility has arrived. These lightweight woven trousers have knee vents for breathability. Bungees at the leg openings and a drawstring at the waist let you get your ideal fit.

title: Nike Pro Dri-FIT
description: The Nike Pro Dri-FIT Top hugs you in lightweight fabric with breathability built into high-heat zones to help keep you cool and dry from warm-ups to cool-downs. Stretchy fabric made from at least 75% recycled polyester fibres comes in a tight fit that easily layers under other tops.

title: Jordan Flight Essentials
description: Designed with an intentionally oversized fit, this tee is ready for whatever the day brings. With a Jumpman woven patch on the chest, no one will question what you're about.

title: Nike Sportswear Heritage86 Futura Washed
description: Crafted from soft fabric, the Nike Sportswear Heritage86 Futura Washed Hat has a 6-panel design for classic comfort, and an adjustable closure for a personalised fit.

title: Nike x sacai
description: Bridging past and present, this full-zip hoodie weaves together the classic Windrunner design with a layered hood and rich mixture of materials. With lots of style points, warmth and versatility, it's a go-to choice for days when you want to layer up and look good.

title: Nike Solo Swoosh
description: These soft fleece trousers are made for comfort and laid-back, nostalgic style. They're roomy through the seat and thighs, then slightly taper to the cuffed ankle. A soft elastic waistband and inner drawcord keep them comfy where it counts. The embroidered Swoosh on the left thigh gives you a clean, effortless finish.

title: Nike Dri-FIT
description: Keep your team covered in the Nike Dri-FIT Jacket. Soft woven fabric uses sweat-wicking technology to help keep you covered, cool and comfortable. Customise the colours for your team's signature look. This product is made from 100% recycled polyester fibres.

title: NikeCourt Dri-FIT
description: Made from soft knit fabric that's made from 100% recycled polyester fibres, the NikeCourt Dri-FIT Polo is a classic-looking, sweat-wicking court staple.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Totality
description: Designed for training, our sweat-wicking Totality Shorts let you keep things simple and fresh. They have a relaxed fit with smooth fabric that offers up comfort whether you're doing reps at the gym or following your favourite workout at home.

title: Nike
description: Look to the Nike Heritage Waistpack to store the small essentials that don't quite fit in your pockets. An internal zipped stash pocket helps keep things organised and easy to grab. This product is made from at least 65% recycled polyester.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Victory
description: Crafted from breathable, sweat-wicking fabric, the Nike Dri-FIT Victory Polo puts a new spin on golf performance. This product is made from 100% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Varsity-inspired style meets casual comfort in this heavyweight tee. The soft cotton has a stiff drape for a premium feel, while the slightly dropped shoulders, longer sleeves and roomy fit keep things relaxed.

title: Nike Dri-FIT ADV Run Division TechKnit
description: Light and breathable in all the right places, this Run Division Top keeps it easy and breezy on the road to new PBs. Running is part of your busy day, so we made a top that's versatile enough to wear from job to gym. It's perfect for when you need to hit the tarmac at a moment's notice.

title: Nike Sportswear Tech Pack
description: These Tech Pack shorts are made from our innovative Nike Forward material for an impossibly soft and lightweight feel. Distinct details, like laser-cut pockets with raw edges and subtle front pleating, elevate the finish.

title: Jordan Flight MVP
description: Layups or lay out on the beach? Whatever you choose, these shorts are a no-brainer. Mesh panels keep them breezy and breathable so you can enjoy yourself in comfort.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: The Nike Sportswear T-Shirt sets you up with soft cotton jersey and a classic logo on the chest.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Challenger
description: Designed for running, training and yoga, these Challenger Shorts keep it lightweight and breathable with a relaxed fit to help you get the most out of your stride. Plus, a comfortable pocket won't irritate when you move from the track to the gym.

title: Nike Club
description: When your daily outings call for preparation, these well-equipped Nike Club cargo trousers give you more pockets to securely stow the extras. We made these from a soft-yet-durable cotton Ripstop fabric in a roomy fit for casual, care-free comfort.

title: Nike Life
description: Crafted from premium, heavyweight knit fabric, this short-sleeve top from our Nike Life collection puts an elevated spin on an everyday essential. The thick, dual-layered knit ribbing on the collar adds texture and durability.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Loading. Loading. Restart your day with this midweight cotton tee, designed with a roomy feel that you can wear until it's time to power down.

title: Nike Sportswear Sport Essentials
description: Whether you're running to the nearest food truck or diving into your favourite swimming hole, the Nike Sportswear Sport Essentials Lined Flow Shorts are a good idea. Lined for comfort, the smooth woven fabric is lightweight and lends itself to adventures of all kinds.

title: Nike Heritage
description: A comfortable and easy-to-adjust strap makes taking the Nike Heritage Waistpack on everyday trips a no-brainer. The main compartment provides secure storage for your phone, snacks or wallet, while the smaller accessories pocket on the back helps keep things like your keys or travel info safe and close at hand. This product is made from at least 65% recycled polyester.

title: Nike
description: Store and carry your shoes in style with the Nike Shoe Box Bag. Made with durable materials, the main body features two large Nike logos, a removable cross-body strap and a true shoebox flap opening. On the inside, an internal elastic pocket and zipped mesh pocket help keep extra laces and other small items stored and organised.

title: Jordan Flight Fleece
description: Relaxed, comfortable, all-day versatile—these super-soft fleece trousers are everything you need them to be. Elastic at the cuffs lets you show off your favourite kicks, while the stitched-down Flight label and metal-tipped drawcords elevate even the most casual fit.

title: Jordan Flight Essentials
description: Big 'n' baggy for comfort and style. This super-soft tee features longer sleeves and dropped shoulders. Combined with a minimal Jumpman woven chest patch, you're lookin' n-i-c-e.

title: Nike Everyday Plus
description: Getting the most out of your workout shouldn't be compromised by aching feet. These socks feature cushioning on the forefoot and heel to provide that extra buffer, and sweat-wicking technology is there too, for when your workout turns turbo.

title: Jordan Flight MVP
description: Ball through autumn in these shorts. They're made from soft fleece that's smooth on the outside and plush on the inside, with an all-over print that's gonna catch attention.

title: Jordan Dri-FIT Sport
description: You need joggers to see you through a full workout—and here they are. Made from soft, sweat-wicking fabric, this pair will keep you fresh through the toughest sessions. They're made to fit more snugly than classic joggers, with design lines nodding to MJ's original Wings tracksuit. And the cuffs fall just high enough to show off your favourite kicks.

title: Jordan Dri-FIT Sport
description: Iconic as ever, the Diamond shorts are back. This pair is made from four-way stretch-woven fabric and enhanced with sweat-wicking tech. You'll look and feel fresh—on-court and off-court, from the free throw line to the checkout line.

title: Nike Outdoor Play
description: Impromptu freeze tag games. Scaling the monkey bars. Running around at playtime. The Nike shorts keep up with your favourite activities. Part of our Outdoor Play collection, it's inspired by having fun and getting outside. How so? The durable water-repellent fabric lets you splash away with summer fun from the park to your back garden.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Multi+
description: Gym class. Playtime. Train. The Nike Multi+ shorts help you through it all—like ALL of your sports and activities. The fabric is lightweight and super-breathable, plus has a stretchy waistband for a fit that feels just right. We won't be surprised if it's your number 1 pick when it's time to play.

title: Nike Culture of Basketball
description: Hurry up and get your squad together ASAP! Team up and match with your best friends on the court in these mesh Nike Basketball shorts. What we love most: they're reversible, so you can change your team colours any time you like. We're ready to play, are you?

title: Nike Dri-FIT Primary
description: Run, cycle, lift, stretch—no matter where your workout takes you, we have you covered in the sweat-wicking Primary Top. We designed it to be soft and comfortable, with underarm ventilation to help keep you cool during your reps.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Run Division Rise 365
description: The Run Division collection is back. Whether you're an elite runner, a weekly warrior or just finding your stride again, the pieces are designed to keep you moving and hit your goals over the final sun-soaked days. This Rise 365 tank top is made from sweat-wicking fabric that doesn't cling to your skin so you can stay dry and comfortable wherever your run takes you.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Multi+
description: Gym class. Playtime. Train. The Nike Dri-FIT Multi+ top helps you through it all—like ALL of your sports and activities. The fabric is lightweight and super breathable with a sport-themed graphic. We won't be surprised if it's your No. 1 pick when it's time to play.

title: Nike Sportswear Club Fleece
description: Sunny days call for comfy clothes. The Nike Sportswear Club Fleece shorts bring a super-soft feel with a snug waistband that lets you have fun everywhere—from the classroom to the playground and in between.

title: Nike Air Force 1 LV8 2
description: There's a lot to love about the AF-1: Its tough stitching and grippy tread helps you find your footing on first days and rainy days alike. It's the shoe that was as cool 20 years ago as it is today, and it will be even when it's covered in stains, scuffs and scrapes. Actually, it might even be better.

title: Jordan 1 Low Alt SE
description: Wherever this summer takes your little one, they're ready to pounce in this pair of Js. The classic comfort and style they love is infused with big cat energy—wait 'til they see the embroidered claw-torn Swoosh and claw marks. A panther patch on the hook-and-loop closure keeps your kid's look ferocious.

title: Air Jordan 2 Retro Low
description: Prepare to be envied by your sneakerhead pals. Since its '87 debut, the AJ2 has caught eyes with its sleek, streamlined design. This throwback is sure to continue that trend with fresh colours and the "lizard skin" accents that helped make these kicks iconic.

title: Nike Force 1 LV8 3
description: Do a double-take and double the fun with the Nike Force 1 LV8 3. Repeated "NIKE" logos on the heel bring a new look while still keeping the classic feel of the '82 original remade for kids.

title: Air Jordan 1 Low SE
description: Wherever this summer takes you, you're ready to pounce with this pair of AJ1s. The look you love is infused with big-cat energy: an embroidered claw-torn Swoosh and claw marks plus a removable panther patch keep your look ferocious.

title: Jordan 7 Retro
description: Little Js make a big impression. The Jordan 7 Retro for babies and toddlers is comfy, supportive and super easy to get on and off. Its shape and details are inspired by the classic Air Jordan 7.

title: Nike Air More Uptempo
description: What stands out about the Nike Air More Uptempo? We'll let you (or your kid) take a guess. It's all about the A-I-R! These play-ready shoes were in a league of their own in the '90s hoops era. Now, little feet blaze a new trail with the swag of a legend and Air cushioning that lasts all day.

title: Nike Air Force 1 LV8 3
description: Do a double take and double your fun with the Nike Air Force 1 LV8 3. Repeat "Air" branding on the heel brings a new look, while the '82 icon still keeps the classic feel and design remade just for kids.

title: Nike Sunray Adjust 6 SE
description: Made for those mega-fun beach days. Maybe your little one is heading to swimming class. Or, they just need an easy slip-on for playing in the sun. The Nike Sunray Adjust 6 is super plush when the warm weather hits. The edges keep little feet contained when they play—we don't like slipping! Also, a strap closure makes everything easier.

title: Nike Force 1
description: Lace up little feet into the iconic Nike Force 1 for a classic look and feel.Soft cushioning helps keep little feet comfy for every growing step.

title: Nike Force 1 LV8 3
description: The Nike Force 1 re-imagines an '80s icon for little feet. Fresh stitching details add extra style, while a durable design and soft foam introduce your kid to a legend.

title: Air Jordan 3 Retro SE
description: The AJ3 returns, this time in an interplanetary colourway. A white backdrop gets you ready for lift-off, setting the stage for fiery bursts of Team Orange. Mars Stone elephant print and suede detailing anchor your 'fit to a classic vintage aesthetic (while paying homage to the landscape of the red planet). For a pop of contrast, black branding rounds off the look. And don't worry about comfort—you can count on tried-and-tested Nike Air cushioning underfoot to keep you going on your journey.

title: Nike Dunk Low SE
description: Time to dress up one of our faves! The Nike Dunk Low SE is going checked for a look that never gets old. Smooth, durable leather is made to last. Plus, the rubber sole gives traction wherever you play, whether it's at class, break time or the local park.

title: Nike Force 1
description: Lace up little feet in the Nike Force 1 for the classic look and feel of the legendary AF-1.Soft cushioning helps keep their steps feeling smooth, and leather is easy to clean.

title: Jordan 4 Retro
description: Fly just like MJ. The Jordan 4 Retro for babies and toddlers has all the unmistakable identity of MJ's famous 4th game shoe, but in a design fully tuned for growing feet.

title: Jordan 1 Low Alt SE
description: Wherever this summer takes your little one, they're ready to pounce in this pair of Js. Classic comfort and style is infused with big-cat energy—wait 'til they see the embroidered tear-through Swoosh and claw marks. A panther patch on the hook-and-loop closure keeps your kid's look ferocious.

title: Air Jordan 1 Low SE
description: New colours and textures combine to give the AJ-1 a fresh remake, but you're still getting the classic sneaker with its familiar feel. Premium materials and accents give modern expression to an all-time favourite.

title: Nike Dunk High SE
description: Time to say hello to one of our favourites! The Nike Dunk High SE is going with a mix of cool blues for a look that never gets old. Made from smooth durable leather, these shoes are built to last. The high-top design also gives extra support for when you're moving and playing. It's an easy slam dunk.
colour: Summit White/Deep Royal Blue/Light Silver/Baltic Blue

title: Nike Force 1 Low SE
description: This Force 1 Low is perfect for every aspiring astronaut. A favourite for its classic design, these kicks are a fun option kids can wear as they explore the world(s) around them. Durable, comfortable and, most importantly, they're bringing a few alien friends to go along for the ride!

title: Nike Air Force 1 LV8
description: Step into the future while celebrating the past. The AF-1 LV8 rocks the same hoops-inspired design of the 1982 original, plus a fresh take on a paisley Swoosh.

title: Air Jordan 1 Mid SE
description: Rock some retro colours and look good doin' it. This pair of kicks has nubuck leather and suede in the upper for a plush look and feel. Nike Air in the sole keeps your every step light as … well, air.

title: Nike Kawa SE JDI
description: Slip on the Nike Kawa SE JDI for plush comfort with Swoosh swag. These sandals are soft and flexible to help them recover after playtime or to get out the door fast.

title: Nike Kawa
description: Super easy to slip on and wear, the Nike Kawa Slide is ready so you can get out of the door fast. With soft, plush foam underfoot, you may never take them off.

title: Air Jordan 1 Low SE
description: Rock some retro colours and look good doin' it. These Js have genuine and synthetic leather in the upper for a luxe look and feel. Nike Air in the sole keeps your every step light as … well, air.

title: Nike Kawa SE
description: For getting to and from training. Heading to the pool. Or just looking to quickly slip something on. The Nike Kawa slides are your easy, any-day and any-time slip-ons. The soft cushioning underfoot is flexible to help your feet stay comfy.

title: Nike Force 1 Low SE
description: One word describes our mini-me Air Force 1 with cute clown fish graphics: fin-tastic! They bring the classic durable leather feel that makes this shoe a favourite for generations. The special edition has fish graphics, plus scales on the sides—like a big hug from their favourite sea creature.

title: Nike Aqua Sock 360
description: Whether it's the pool, beach or your back garden, let your little one splash away with the Nike Aqua Sock. This slip-on shoe gets kids where they want to go when it's water time. The soft mesh is super breathable and dries easily. They fit snugly around little feet and have rubber traction to help little walkers step comfortably.

title: Nike Sunray Adjust 6 SE
description: Made for those mega-fun beach days. Maybe swimming classes at the pool. Or you just need an easy slip-on for playing under the sun. The Nike Sunray Adjust 6 is super plush when the warm weather hits. The edges help keep your feet contained when you play—we don't like slipping! Also, a strap closure makes everything easier.

title: Jordan 23/7
description: Get your kid some shoes that are on their level. The Jordan 23/7 was created just for kids, with an easy-on design and an extra-supportive build. With features like a bigger opening for wiggly feet and nice big pulls on the collar and heel, kids get more control of their shoes, their comfort and (most importantly) their fun—no grown-ups necessary.

title: Nike Blazer Mid '77
description: The Nike Blazer Mid '77 channels the old-school look of Nike Basketball with a vintage midsole finish.Throwback style with modern materials means you can run, skip and jump in comfort.

title: Sky Jordan 1
description: Inspired by the AJ1, the Sky Jordan 1 is equal parts iconic and adorable. It has soft foam cushioning, rubber traction and a hook-and-loop strap for easy on and off.

title: Jordan Stadium 90
description: Comfort is king, but that doesn't mean you have to sacrifice style. Taking design inspiration from the AJ1 and AJ5, the Stadium 90 is ready for everyday wear. The upper is made from leather and airy Ripstop, so you get both breathability and durability, and Nike Air cushioning in the sole keeps your every step light and cushioned.

title: Sky Jordan 1
description: Inspired by the AJ1, the Sky Jordan 1 is equal parts iconic and adorable. It has soft foam cushioning, durable traction and a hook-and-loop strap for easy on and off.

title: Nike Air More Uptempo
description: One thing stands out about the Nike Air More Uptempo. We'll let you (and your kid) take a guess as to what that might be. Need a hint? It's all about the A-I-R! These everyday shoes were in a league of their own during the '90s basketball era. Now, they're ready to help your little one blaze a new trail with the swag of a legend and the lasting comfort of Air cushioning.

title: Nike Dynamo GO SE
description: Playtime lovers + jellyfish fans unite! Get their tentacles (AKA their legs!) moving with the Nike Dynamo GO SE. An easy on-and-off collapsible heel means little ones can slip in and go. The awesome squiggly lines on the top help keep little feet secure while they glide and roam around when it's time to have fun.
colour: Sea Coral/Light Photo Blue/Summit White/Vivid Orange

title: Nike Blazer Low '77
description: The Nike Blazer Low '77 has transcended the basketball court to streetwear and is ready to land on your kid's feet.Tuck their toes into this icon for an old-school look that keeps little feet comfy on all their adventures.

title: Nike Dunk Low
description: Your little one will shine like an all-star in the Dunk Low. Durable leather helps these hold up to playtime while a rubber outsole gives little feet the traction they need to run, skip and hop the whole year through.

title: Nike Air Force 1 LV8 3
description: These AF-1s are our jam. Celebrating hip-hop's early roots, these kicks are an ode to anyone who's danced or freestyled to one of the most popular music genres of all time. Made for future artists and fans, we remixed throwback graphics with details inspired by records, cassette tapes and CDs to honour how the genre has evolved since it began in the '70s. For the final verse, a special pendant drops the mic on this classic sneaker.

title: Nike Kawa Print
description: The Nike Kawa Print Younger/Older Kids' Slide features a plush, textured footbed and flexible sole to help your feet recover after competition.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Miler
description: Get ready to kick it into high gear in the Nike Dri-FIT Miler Top.Breathable fabric and Dri-FIT Technology help keep you cool and dry when you're playing hard.This product is made from at least 50% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike Kawa SE
description: Mini water explorers love splashing around in the Nike Kawa slides. Discover the graphics showing off the underwater adventures of our favourite sea creatures. They slip on easily and stay secure with a stretchy heel strap.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Trophy
description: What do we love about this Nike active top? Everything! Sweat doesn't stand a chance against it, meaning you can rock it with confidence when shooting hoops, going for a run or even when powering through homework after school. The possibilities are endless.

title: Jordan Max Aura 4
description: This next-generation hoops-inspired shoe takes cues from its predecessors. Classic details show up in the moulded branding on the sole, embroidered graphics on the tongue and visible Air in the heel. Bold rubber tread and cloud-like cushioning will keep you light on your feet. So, what are you waiting for? Get out there and take flight.

title: Nike Air Max SYSTM
description: Cassette mixtapes. Music videos on TV. Shopping centre arcades. The '80s were fun and wild! We're celebrating that wicked cool era with the Nike Air Max SYSTM. From the big and bold Air unit to design lines (inspired by our favourite throwback Air Max shoes), it's all about bringing back what's cool to a new generation.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Multi+
description: Time to stock up your drawer with active tops! Whether you're training, in school or just having fun, the Nike Dri-FIT Multi+ top can help you do it all—with a logo that makes things even more fun. The fabric is breathable, plus sweat won't get in the way, so playtime never stops.

title: Tatum 1
description: Before they can put up points, your MVP's gotta put on the shoes. The Tatum 1 is designed for easy entry, so kids can help put on their own shoes and get to playtime extra quick. Lightweight, durable and secure, they've got little feet covered with every big step.

title: Nike Sunray Adjust 6 SE
description: Made for those mega-fun beach days or swimming class. Or they just need an easy slip-on to play and crawl under the sun. The Nike Sunray Adjust 6 is super plush when the warm weather hits. The edges help keep little feet contained when they play—no slipping here! And, a strap closure makes everything easier.

title: Nike Air More Uptempo
description: One thing stands out about the Nike Air More Uptempo. Take a guess. It's all about the A-I-R! These play-ready shoes were in a league of their own in the '90s hoops era. Now, blaze your own trail with the swag of a legend and Air cushioning that lasts all day.

title: Jordan 23/7 SE
description: Get your kid some shoes that are on their level. The Jordan 23/7 was created just for kids, with an easy-on design and an extra-supportive build. With features like a bigger opening for wiggly feet and nice big pulls on the collar and heel, kids get more control of their shoes, their comfort and (most importantly) their fun—no grown-ups necessary.

title: Nike Blazer Mid '77 SE
description: Could this shoe spark your passion for hoops? It's called the Blazer, and it's one of the oldest hoopers in our line-up, so it's certainly qualified for the job. But before you cross, dash, dunk and beat the buzzer, you better get your shoe game in order. A mash-up of colours, textures and logos gives this classic a modern look ready for everyday wear.

title: Jordan Play
description: Get all the underfoot support you need with this essential Jordan Play slide. Enjoy thick, lightweight foam and cushioning for beach days or post-game hangouts.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Athletics

title: Jordan 2 Retro

Making its debut in 1986, the AJ2 was the cool younger sibling of its famous predecessor—a sleeker and more pared-down version of the iconic AJ1. title: Nike Sportswear

description: The Nike Dri-FIT Trousers are your light, stretchy layer for training or play. With Dri-FIT Technology, sweat has no chance while you move.

description: Step into the future while celebrating the past. The AF-1 LV8 rocks the same hoops-inspired design of the 1982 original, plus bright details lighting up your path to growth.

title: Tatum 1
description: Before they can put up points, your MVP's gotta put on the shoes. The Tatum 1 is designed for easy entry, so kids can help put on their own shoes and get to playtime extra quick. Lightweight, durable and secure, they've got little feet covered with every big step.

And the look is 100% classic Jordan. They'll stay stylish (as if there was any doubt!) and you'll stay cool. Win win.
colour: Sky J Purple/White/Sky J Light Purple

Plus, this version features a Swoosh logo and backtab that changes colour when exposed to UV light for fun in the sun with every step.

Now, they're ready to help your little one blaze a new trail with the swag of a legend and the lasting comfort of Air cushioning.

The signature wavy lines are also inspired by water ripples. Originally made for running, the 97 is now a pair of kicks you can rock anywhere, any day of the week.

title: Air Jordan 2 Retro

Making its debut in 1986, the AJ-2 was the cool younger sibling of its famous predecessor—a sleeker and more pared-down version of the iconic AJ-1. With premium leather and an Air-Sole unit underfoot, this throwback serves up the ultimate combo of wearability and style.

title: Nike Air Max 90 Toggle
description: The Nike Air Max 90 Toggle sees the future join forces with an icon. We add the quick-and-easy toggle system that makes getting them on and off a breeze. With the same OG details and features, we turn up a classic for tomorrow.

description: The inspiration for the PSG 2023/24 Home kit comes from La Ville Lumiere (City of Light). Our Stadium collection pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking technology to give you a game-ready look inspired by your favourite team.

description: Our designers reached into the archives to design the Liverpool F.C. 2023/24 Away shirt, drawing inspiration from a colour-blocked kit first released in '95.
