description: You need a jacket that's lightweight and allows you to move. Enter this woven layer that's simple and easy to wear during almost any activity. Plus, it's powered by Dri-FIT Technology so sweat will never get in the way of fun. This product is made from 100% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Looking for a lightweight layer you can take with you when you're on the go? We've got you covered! The loose fit of this sheer jacket lets you move and play comfortably while keeping you cool. Best of all, it packs away neatly when not needed.

title: Nike Multi
category: Older Kids' (Boys') Dri-FIT Graphic Training Shorts
description: Love sports? Love playing in the garden or at your favourite park? Stay active with the Nike Dri-FIT Multi+ Shorts. The fabric is breathable and has sweat-wicking tech so the fun never has to stop.

title: Nike Sportswear Tech Fleece
description: Make the most of chilly days with the Nike Sportswear Tech Fleece Hoodie. This full-zip is all about our innovative premium fleece that's soft, lightweight and warm. Added bonus: There's a zipped pocket on your left sleeve.

title: Nike Kawa SE2
description: The Nike Kawa Slide SE2 is easy to slip on and feels squishy and comfy under your toes. They're all about keeping feet happy.
colour: Arctic Punch/Light Armoury Blue/Light Liquid Lime/Arctic Punch

title: Nike Multi
description: A new season calls for new gear to play your favourite sports—or just playing for fun outside. Get started with the Nike Dri-FIT Multi+ active top. It's lightweight, breathable and helps sweat stay away. Stock up! How many colours do you want them in?

title: Nike Challenger
description: The Nike Challenger Shorts are your new go-to for running, playing and everything in between. This lightweight design is geared up with three pockets, including a top secret one at the back, for your on-the-go must-haves. This product is made from at least 75% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike MD Valiant
description: These everyday kicks throw it back by mashing up details from '80s running shoes. Plus, the Nike MD Valiant is full of history. They're named after the car that Nike's co-founder sold shoes out of during the early days—the '64 Valiant.

title: Jordan 2 Retro
description: Your little one's gonna rock a classic right! Making its debut in 1986, the AJ2 was the cool younger sibling of its famous predecessor—a sleeker and more pared-down version of the iconic AJ1. A durable upper combined with a supportive foam sole makes it the ultimate combination of performance and style.

title: Nike Force 1 Low
description: First on the basketball courts in the '80s. Now wearable everywhere from class to the playground, they've been an icon for decades—meaning a long time! Smooth, durable leather is built to last for many days of play, and the rubber outsole gives traction so little ones can move on many surfaces. This is what legends are made of.

title: Nike Rift 2
description: Get ready for the beach, the park or just playing in the garden under the sun. The Nike Rift 2 gives a super-airy feel with its open-hole mesh. Splash away with your water toys and hang out when the weather gets warm. Comfy foam and solid rubber help give comfort and traction wherever you play. Easily take them off with the adjustable strap. Playtime can't get here soon enough!

title: Nike Blazer Mid '77
description: Old school meets new beginnings in the Blazer Mid '77. Leather adds durability and support for everyday wear while maintaining the classic look of retro basketball.

title: Nike Court Borough Low Recraft
description: Start little ones off on the right foot with the new Court Borough. Made for the long haul, this "recrafted" legend uses a combination of durable materials on the upper and outsole to achieve a classic look made in a whole new way. A redesigned toe box and midfoot give feet a little extra room so little ones can run, jump and play just a bit longer and harder in comfort.

title: Nike Force 1 LE
description: This is what legends are made of. The Nike Force 1 LE brings back the '82 hardwood icon into an everyday style in all-white or all-black. Let the durability, cushioning and feel introduce little feet to a classic.

title: Jordan 23/7
description: Picture this: it's park day, and your little one is ready to GO GO GO. They're already at the door, shoes on, stomping in excitement. But you didn't need to help them get ready—they've pulled on their kicks all by themselves. The Jordan 23/7 was created just for kids, with features like a bigger opening for wiggly feet and extra-large pulls on the collar and heel. Kids get more control of their shoes, their comfort and (most importantly) their fun—no grown-ups necessary.

title: Nike Sportswear Club Fleece
description: Run, jump and keep your cool all year long. An ideal option when our thick fleece feels too warm, these shorts are perfect for running through the school year and straight into summer. The soft French terry fabric has a lightweight feel—like your classic joggers. Pull them on and tighten them up using the internal drawcord for a perfect fit you can count on.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Boxy did it! He finally got the sneakers he's been after. Celebrate his win with this soft cotton tee.

title: Nike Air
description: You can never have enough joggers in your wardrobe. They're an everyday staple that can be paired with almost anything—like your favourite tee or hoodie. Our Nike Air trousers tick all the boxes: Soft. Lightweight. Cosy. Add a touch of Nike Air graphics, a fit that's not too loose and not too tight and there's no doubt you'll love these.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Made for those warm-weather days, the beach, park and playground. This Nike tank has you ready to play in the sun with soft, lightweight cotton.

title: Nike Sportswear Club Fleece
description: It's like getting your own tie-dye kit and throwing it on your favourite shorts. But WAY more awesome because it's less messy. Let the colours and design spark your imagination! Worth rocking any day of the week, these soft and lightweight Club Fleece shorts are the go-to warm-weather style you'll instantly love.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Celebrate your love for sprinkles, cupcakes, free time to play with your friends and anything else that makes you smile. Its classic fit gives you room to move without feeling too big while soft cotton makes it a go-to whether you're at a birthday party or chasing good times at break time.

title: Nike ACG
description: The Nike ACG shorts make playing with water super fun. Whether it's by your favourite pond, on holiday by a lake or playing with your favourite water toys, getting wet is no problem. Why? Our durable woven nylon fabric is meant for it and the waist buckle makes sure you can focus on having fun. The nature-inspired print gets your imagination going for whatever adventure is next.

title: Nike Air
description: Look up hoodie in the dictionary and what do you see? An everyday staple that's soft, cosy and goes with almost anything for an outfit made easy. Add a poof of Nike Air graphics, and you can't hit 'Add to Bag' fast enough.

title: Nike ACG Repel
description: Going outside? ACG has your go-to top to jump-start any adventure. Wear it as your only layer or first layer under your hoodie and jacket for day hikes, camping and just getting outdoors. The fabric is smooth and stretchy with a slim fit, plus the fabric repels water to help you stay dry.

title: Nike ACG
description: The Nike ACG shorts make playing in water super fun. Whether it's splashing in your favourite pond, holidaying by a lake or playing with water toys, getting wet is extra cool. Why, you ask? Our special woven fabric reveals ACG graphics when it gets wet. Plus it's quick to dry when you're done in the water. It's so awesome, you're going to love adventures even more.

title: Nike Dri-FIT
description: Whether you're taking up football for the first time or are already a serious player, gear up in confidence with the Nike Dri-FIT shorts. Their breathable fabric wicks sweat away from your skin while you run, dribble and shoot. From team training to working on your skills in the back garden, these shorts are ideal for whenever football comes calling.

title: Nike Fly Crossover
description: Play like you mean it in the Nike Fly Crossover Shorts. Dri-FIT technology wicks sweat from your skin to keep you dry and comfy during games or training.

title: Liverpool F.C. 2023/24 Stadium Home
category: Older Kids' Nike Dri-FIT Football Shirt
description: Packed with details, the Liverpool F.C. 2023/24 Home shirt remembers the 97 people who tragically died in the Hillsborough Disaster. A 97 set between two eternal flames resides on the inside of the shirt, while white accents at the collar and sleeves nod to a shirt worn by the legendary '74 squad. Our Stadium collection pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking technology to give you a game-ready look inspired by your favourite team.

title: Nike Dri-FIT One
description: Practise your favourite sport. Throw a dance party with your besties. Or just go outside and play! The Nike Dri-FIT One tank is our most versatile yet. It's snug, stretchy and waves goodbye to sweat so every move can feel comfortable. Plus, we added some star power and a cute cut-out to help you fall in love that much more.

title: Nike Dri-FIT ACG
description: Day hikes. Camping trips. Or just playing outdoors. The Nike tee is part of our ACG (All Conditions Gear) Collection, so it's ready for anything. Made from soft, sweat-wicking fabric, stay cool and comfortable on your next adventure.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: A dress that feels like your favourite tee? YES, please. This lightweight cotton jersey dress has you dancing, twirling and having fun all day long. We love the print too, giving off prehistoric jungle vibes inspired by kids who are always exploring undiscovered spaces. It's totally selfie-worthy.

title: Nike Swoosh
description: The Nike Swoosh sports bra sees plush fabric and snug comfort team up to give you the everyday support you need. It also wicks away sweat so you can stay focused on what's ahead. What's more: We've made it reversible, because having 2 looks is always better than 1.

title: Nike Air Max 90 LTR
description: The Nike Air Max 90 LTR returns with an even better feel for you. Cushioning is softer and more flexible than previous versions, and the Max Air unit is tuned for growing feet, while the shape gives your toes more wiggle room. With a design and look that are still awesome, it brings a '90s fave to a new generation.

title: Nike One
description: Whether you're riding your bike up and down your street or just hanging out with friends, our Nike Dri-FIT One Bike Shorts are made for anything. Sweat doesn't stand a chance thanks to their stretchy, body-hugging fabric. Wear them solo or under your favourite skirts and dresses—the possibilities are endless with our most versatile shorts yet!

title: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 40
description: Anything can be a race, right? First one to the telephone pole? First one to get to the swings? Whatever the game, these lightweight, breathable Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 40 Shoes help get you there. Bouncy and responsive, the outsole flexes with your foot so you cut, corner and spring into action when it's time to run.

title: LeBron Witness 7
description: When opponents face LeBron James, they know they're in trouble. Feel like one of the game's greats with lightweight support in all the right places so you can move confidently with every run and jump. A big Max Air unit brings the cushioning you need to fly around the court, while repping everything LeBron.

title: Nike Star Runner 4
description: Get out of the door in a flash with the Star Runner. Loops on the tongue and heel make it easy to open the shoe up wide so little star runners can step in and get going. Soft cushioning in the midsole provides a comfortable, springy return so 1 more round, lap and turn is always an option. The tread grabs at pavement, grass and gravel to give them extra grip while a rubber-wrapped toe toughens up the construction so they can go further in the same pair of Star Runners.

title: LeBron XX
description: There's a reason LeBron James is considered one of the best. From racking up MVPs to winning championships, the King has shattered expectations on the court for nearly 2 decades. Celebrate that dominance in the LeBron XX (or LeBron 20), the 20th edition of his signature shoe. With Zoom Air cushioning and a super-lightweight feel, they'll help you run, jump and compete until the final buzzer sounds.

title: Australia 2023 Stadium Home
category: Older Kids' Nike Dri-FIT Football Shirt
description: How do you design a shirt for a country unlike any other? You zero in on its uniqueness. An all-over marbled pattern draws on the golden wattle to give the Australia 2023 Home shirt a one-of-a-kind look that celebrates Australia's diverse communities and bright footballing future. A hidden graphic on the inside reads "For All", a nod to the spirit in which the national team plays. Like other shirts in our Stadium collection, this one pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking technology to give you a game-ready look inspired by the Matildas.

title: Nike Flex Runner 2 Lil
description: Future racers + octopus lovers unite! Get their tentacles (AKA legs!) Moving with the Nike Flex Runner 2. No laces make these shoes easy to slip on and off. They're also super flexible, plus a cushioned foam sole keeps running and jumping fun. Ocean-like colours and octopus graphics wrap around little feet—like a H-U-G from their favourite sea animal.

title: Nike Star Runner 4
description: Because ice-cream vans, games of tig and races to the end of the street and back can only wait for so long, we made it easy for you to slip the Star Runner on and get going. Soft cushioning in the midsole provides a comfortable, springy feel so every skip, hop and stride you take is one closer to the finishing line. The tread grabs at pavement, grass and gravel to give you extra grip while a rubber-wrapped toe toughens up the construction so you can go further in the same pair of Star Runners.

title: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 40 PR
description: 40 years. Generations of running. The Pegasus 40 reps the past and future of Nike Running. Whether you're gearing up for a school athletics competition, athletics training or fun runs (like your gym class mile), this shoe is for runners of all levels. They're breathable so your feet stay cool with every lap. Zoom Air and responsive foam team up for the cushioning you need to feel comfortable with every stride. It's time to fly!

title: Nike Air Zoom Arcadia 2
description: Race day is every day! Lace up and step into the same feel-good excitement you experience at the starting line of every race. Jog, run or sprint with an extra push from our responsive cushioning. Plus, an improved fit up top helps ensure these feel just right while you go the extra mile.

title: Nike Force 1 Low SE
description: One word describes our mini-me AF-1 with cute clown fish graphics: fin-tastic! They bring the classic durable leather feel that makes the original a favourite for generations. This special edition has fish graphics, plus scales on the sides—like a big hug from their favourite sea creature.

title: Nike Flex Plus 2 SE
description: The Nike Flex Plus 2 wastes no time so kids can get out to run and play. We're talking playtime, gym class and their favourite activities. The innovative elastic band system makes getting these shoes on a breeze—they'll love it! They're breathable, plus durable in all the right places for little feet. Best of all: our designers made them super flexible so every move feels like their best and most natural.

title: LeBron Witness 7
description: From the playground to PE lessons, the LeBron Witness 7 gives your little one those MVP feels. A lightweight and breathable design helps feet stay cool while they run around. And, we make things super simple with crossing elastic laces and a strap, so your future superstar can feel confident having fun while repping everything LeBron.

title: Nike Flex Plus 2 SE
description: The easy-on design of the Nike Flex Plus 2 SE helps you get out the door fast. Whether you're looking to race your friends at break time, power through gym class or train for your next athletics meet, the innovative elastic band entry system makes getting them on and off a breeze. Plus, we made these super-flexible so every step and stride feels natural.

title: Freak 4
description: Put up monster numbers. Feel like an MVP. And now, play like a champ with the Freak 4. Giannis's 4th signature shoe comes packed with the finest of the Freak's game. Made to feel ultra-comfy and fast on the court, plus details designed just for the All-Star, carry the swag of everything Giannis when it's time to hoop.

title: Freak 4
description: Little ballers who dream of putting up monster numbers can now feel like an MVP in the Freak 4. Made to be easy, flexible and comfy, Giannis's 4th signature kicks come packed with the best of the Freak. Help your future all-star play like a champ and carry the swag of Giannis from the playground to the hardwood.

description: One thing stands out about the Nike Air More Uptempo. We'll let you take a guess as to what that might be. Need a hint? It's all about the A-I-R! These everyday shoes were in a league of their own during the '90s basketball era. Now, they're ready to help you blaze a new trail with the swag of a legend and the lasting comfort of Air cushioning.

title: LeBron XX
description: Made for kids who dream big and strive for greatness, the LeBron XX (or LeBron 20) lets little ones feel like an MVP. Plus, a strap makes these easy to slip on so your future all-star can get out and play with the swagger of the King.

title: Nike Air Force 1
description: Kick it in comfort in the Nike Air Force 1.The feel of classic leather and details that made this shoe an icon are sure to make your sneaker style stand out on the street.

title: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 40
description: 40 years. Generations of running. The Pegasus 40 reps the past and future of Nike Running. Whether you're gearing up for a school athletics competition, athletics training or fun runs (like your gym class mile), this shoe is for runners of all levels. description: The Nike Blazer Low '77 has transcended the basketball court to become an everyday classic and is ready to land on your feet. Tuck your toes into this icon for an old-school look that keeps you comfy on all your adventures.

title: Air Jordan 1 Mid
description: This iteration of the AJ1 re-imagines Mike's first signature model with a fresh mix of colours. Premium materials, soft cushioning and a padded ankle collar offer total support and celebrate the shoe that started it all.

title: Jordan 23/7
description: Picture this: it's park day, and your little one is ready to GO GO GO. They're already at the door, shoes on, stomping in excitement. But you didn't need to help them get ready—they've pulled on their kicks all by themselves. The Jordan 23/7 was created just for kids, with features like a bigger opening for wiggly feet and extra-large pulls on the collar and heel. title: Nike Sunray Adjust 6
description: Maybe your little one is heading to swimming class. Or they just need an easy slip-on to play and crawl under the sun. The Nike Sunray Adjust 6 is super plush when the warm weather hits. The edges help keep little feet contained when they play—we don't like slipping! Also, what's easier than a strap closure? Staying secure is the least of your worries.

description: Bold colours and classic details give the AJ3 a fun, throwback look. It's modelled after Mike's game shoe from the '80s, so you'll be walking in the footsteps of a legend.

description: Get into some summery fun in your new fave AJ1s. Made with a combination of suede and canvas, this pair gives you the comfort you know and love with a seasonal update.

description: The Jordan 4 Retro is inspired by the original AJ4.Made with real and synthetic leather and textile, soft foam cushioning, and play-ready rubber traction, it features the mesh panelling and angled overlays that made the shoe so memorable.

description: The Nike Air Max 90 Toggle sees the future join forces with an icon. The quick-and-easy toggle system makes getting these kicks on and off a breeze. With the same OG details and features, we turn up the classic for tomorrow.

description: Fresh like a scoop of Neapolitan ice cream on a hot day, these mini J's are more than just the flavour of the summer. Sturdy leather and premium textiles up top and supportive foam underfoot make this a solid choice for learning feet. Casual and classic, we predict these kicks will be the coolest pair on the playground.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: With fun, colourful balloon graphics on soft cotton that fits like your favourite T-shirt, we're sure this Nike tee is ready to go up, up and away! Just don't let go of it—you might find yourself in the clouds.

description: It's all about L-O-V-E when you pull on this Nike tee. You'll love the graphics. Don't forget the little details too, which our designers made—a scoop neckline and rounded hem that we're sure you'll also love.

description: Stretch it out. Hold your pose. Breathe. These Nike Yoga Leggings are designed to flow through every move with you. description: Practise your favourite sport. Throw a dance party with your besties. Or just go outside and play. The Nike One tank top is our most versatile yet. It's soft, stretchy and waves goodbye to sweat so you can move comfortably through any activity.

description: For extra miles around the track. Or laps around the playground. It's all a breeze in the Nike Dri-FIT Tempo shorts. description: From maths class to playing sports after school, the Nike Swoosh Sports Bra is essential for everyday life. title: Brazil 2022/23 Home
category: Younger Kids' Nike Dri-FIT Football Shirt
description: Future champions need the kit to match. This lightweight jersey creates a look inspired by the elite. Breathable fabric feels soft and helps keep sweat off their skin for lasting comfort.

description: Spring into action with the help of this comfy cotton tee. Some room around the sleeves and body helps you run, flip, spin and dash without distraction.

It's lightweight and durable, and our favourite part: a big pocket on the back is designed for your water pack so staying hydrated is never an issue while on hikes or just walking under the hot sun.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Academy23
description: Are you ready to hit the pitch? Smooth and soft knit fabric wicks sweat to keep you cool and comfortable while you bring your A-game to every break time, training session and play date. A classic fit gives you room to move without distractions. Ready, set, let's GOAL!

title: Nike Sportswear
description: We love throwback style. In fact, our designers were inspired by the classic rugby stripe look to create this Nike Sportswear Tracksuit. The all-in-one outfit includes a long-sleeve crew and shorts for an easy choice, so no time is wasted thinking of what to wear.

title: Nike Pro
description: Play and feel like your favourite athlete when you pull on the Nike Pro shorts. description: From playing tig at playtime to cartwheeling in your garden, the Nike Dri-FIT Indy sports bra is an everyday essential for play. description: The easy-on design of the Flex Plus 2 helps you get out of the door fast. Plus, we made these super-flexible so every step and stride feels natural.

description: Shoes made for almost any occasion. Playtime? Sure. School? You bet. Activities with friends? Of course! The Nike E-Series 1.0 is your everyday shoe. The highlight is the lace-free design that stretches wide (helped by a hidden strap) so it's easy to slip your feet in. Combining plush comfort underfoot and stability where you need it, we have 1 goal: be confident and have fun every time you pull on your kicks.

title: Nike Sunray Protect 2
description: The Nike Sunray Protect 2 has a quick-drying design, so kids are free to jump, skip and splash. It has a comfortable feel and offers plenty of traction on wet surfaces. A strap on each side offers a secure fit and makes the shoes easy to get on and off.

title: Nike Sunray Protect 2
description: The Nike Sunray Protect 2 Sandals deliver total toe coverage and outsole traction that's perfect for outdoor play. Hook-and-loop straps make on and off easy, while openings on the top of the shoe promote airflow when little feet get hot.

description: Future racers + octopus lovers unite! Get their tentacles (AKA legs!) Moving with the Nike Flex Runner 2. No laces make these shoes easy to slip on and off. description: The Nike Flex Plus 2 wastes no time for kids to learn their first steps and experience their intro to play. Best of all: Our designers made them super flexible so each move gives your future athlete the confidence to keep going.

description: From learning those first steps to picturing your future star hooping, the Nike Team Hustle D 11 covers all of playtime during those early years. description: All little hoopers want playtime to last forever. The Giannis Immortality 2 helps make that happen. Rocking a new-and-improved strap for comfort (stamped with Giannis's logo) and a lightweight feel, these shoes make sure the fun never stops.

description: The Air Jordan 4 Retro delivers lightweight cushioning with a sculpted midsole designed to provide stability. Its throwback details pays tribute to the 1989 original.

title: Nike Revolution 6
description: We prioritise comfort, especially for our growing athletes. Made with 20% recycled content by weight, you can take these lightweight, breathable running shoes from all-day play to any-time wear and even athletics training. Lightweight, breathable and cushioned for growing feet, the race starts now.

title: Nike Court Borough Low 2
description: Comfort and style come together in the Nike Court Borough Low 2. The structured, supportive fit has a retro basketball design so you can look like an all-star off the court.

title: Nike Revolution 6
description: We prioritise comfort, especially for our growing athletes on the move. Made from 20% recycled content by weight, you can take these lightweight, breathable sneakers from all-day play to any-time wear with any outfit.

title: Nike Air Max 90 LTR
description: The Nike Air Max 90 takes the original look to a new level with more comfort and flexibility. It keeps the classic Max Air cushioning you know and love.

title: Jordan Flare
description: Perfect for active kids, the Jordan Flare is light, breathable and comfortable. It's easy to get on, has a heel band to keep it from slipping off and is covered in the front to help prevent toe stubs.

title: Jordan 1 Retro High OG
description: Lead your kid into the heart of sneaker culture with these scaled-down Js. Legendary design elements and durable materials amplify your little baller's everyday game.

title: Nike Dunk Low
description: Show love to the '80s with the Nike Dunk Low. From the durable build to the shoe's shape and feel, we honour this hardwood icon that'll fit easily into your kiddo's budding kicks collection.

title: Jordan 1 Low Alt
description: The Jordan 1 Low Alt keeps little feet comfortable with flexible bands that feel snug and soft foam cushioning underfoot. Leather and synthetic leather have a classic look and feel.

title: Nike Revolution 6
description: The Nike Revolution 6 is all about versatility for little athletes, from all-day play to anytime wear. With easy straps, kids can feel comfy and secure when slipping these on. Lightweight, breathable and made from at least 20% recycled material by weight—you can't go wrong with that.

title: Nike Dunk Low
description: Show love to the '80s with the Nike Dunk Low. From the super-durable build to the shoe's classic shape and feel, we honour this hardwood icon that'll fit easily into your kicks collection and is always ready to play.

title: Nike Dunk Low
description: A legend in basketball lore. An icon in the skate world. The Dunk has been a sneaker fave across many sport cultures for decades. From the durable leather build to the classic shape and feel, we bring back this '80s shoe for a new generation to love.

title: NikeCourt Legacy
description: The NikeCourt Legacy serves up classic tennis style for kiddos. They're durable and comfy with heritage stitching and a retro Swoosh. When your little one puts these on—it's game, set, match.

title: Nike Air Max SYSTM
description: Cassette mixtapes, music videos and shopping centre arcades—the '80s had it all. We're celebrating that gnarly era with the Nike Air Max SYSTM. From the big and bold Air unit in the heel to design lines inspired by our favourite throwback Air Max shoes, these kicks are all about bringing back what's cool and introducing it to a new generation.

title: Jordan 3 Retro
description: Bold colours and classic details give the Jordan 3 its fun, throwback look. It's modelled after Mike's legendary game shoe from the '80s, so your little one can match you and the big kids step for step.

title: Nike Sportswear Club Fleece
category: Older Kids' French Terry Short-Sleeve Sweatshirt
description: Short sleeves on a sweatshirt? Yes, please. Tie-dye, too? Let's go! Rock it every day of the year in this lightweight layer with a little extra room through the body so you can shoot hoops, build forts and chase your friends in total comfort.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Academy
category: Older Kids' Woven Football Tracksuit Bottoms (Stock)
description: Every journey to greatness begins with mastering the fundamentals. But make no mistake, the Nike Dri-FIT Academy Tracksuit Bottoms are anything but basic. They have sweat-wicking fabric to help keep you dry and comfortable during your pre-match or training routine. Choose from 2 colours to outfit your team.

title: Nike Court Borough Low 2
description: Comfort and style come together in the Nike Court Borough Low 2. The structured, supportive fit has a retro basketball design so kids can look like an all-star on and off the court.

title: Jordan 1 Low Alt
description: Have you got five seconds? Then you've got time to get your kid into these Jordans. The hook-and-loop system makes it easy to open up the shoe and secure it onto little feet. And the look is 100% classic Jordan. They'll stay stylish (as if there was any doubt!) and you'll stay cool. Win win.
colour: Sky J Purple/White/Sky J Light Purple

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Pound the tarmac in the comfort of this easy-fitting tee. Some room through the sleeves and body gives you just the right amount of room to run, jump and play without distraction. Its cracked Futura print is inspired by the tarmac where athletes around the world learn to play their favourite games.

title: Nike Dynamo Go
description: Easy, snug and built for play any time—the Nike Dynamo Go will be your little one's next fave. What we love most is that kiddos can stomp down on the collapsible heel and slip in quick and easy. And if they're not quite ready to do it themselves, you can show them how it works so they can be free and independent! It's also soft and plush in the best places, so the fun never stops.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Breezy
description: Gym class. Playtime. Train. The Nike Dri-FIT shorts help you through it all. The fabric is soft, stretchy and lightweight, plus has a secret pocket inside the waistband to fit a small essential. We won't be surprised if it's your No. 1 pick when playtime comes.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: From scavenger hunts to outdoor playtime, the Nike Sportswear Cargo Trousers are adventure-ready. These crinkly woven trousers have a 4-pocket design (including 2 zipped ones!) with an elastic waistband and cuffs for a flexibly snug fit.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Social media. Gaming. Apps. We love staying connected to friends and family in this digital world. These Nike trousers rock tech-y graphics inspired by today's age. Level up your trousers game, while staying comfy and wrapping up in soft fleece.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Swoosh
description: It's the best of both worlds: an all-in-1 Nike tank top and sports bra combo so you don't have to search the wardrobe for both if you're in a hurry. The lightweight tank helps keep the sweat away while you run, jump and play. The built-in bra gives plenty of support, too. You can wear this tank alone or as a sports bra underneath your kit or jacket. The choice is yours.

title: Nike One
category: Older Kids' (Girls') Dri-FIT Short-Sleeve Training Top
description: Our most versatile top for any sport and activity? Yes, please. The Nike Dri-FIT One Top is comfy to wear whether you're running, jumping or playing. It feels soft and lightweight with sweat-wicking support. This product is made from 100% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike Dri-FIT One
description: Snap up every opportunity to have fun in these gator print Dri-FIT One Leggings. Soft, stretchy and made to keep you cool and comfortable, they're an A+ for every activity under the sun.

title: Nike Outdoor Play
description: Sometimes a little rain (or wind) can make playing outside even more fun. What do you think? Made from fabric that has water-repellent properties, this lightweight layer lets you keep on playing even when the weather throws you a curveball.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Make the most of sunny days in this cropped cotton tee. Shorter than our standard tees, it's a great option for high-waisted leggings and trousers.

title: Nike Air
description: Fans of cropped tees will no doubt love this one. Still feels like your classic tee (soft and lightweight), but now with graphics repping all things Nike Air. So awesome!

title: Nike Sportswear
description: There's a special secret you'll love about these trousers. Fold over the elastic waistband for the length and look you want, and then … ta-da! See the fun wave of Swoosh logos around the inner waistband. Wear these durable woven trousers any day and for the full look, pair them with our matching tracksuit jacket.

title: Nike Team Hustle D 11
description: Basketball training. PE lessons. Outside play. Cover all of playtime with the Nike Team Hustle D 11. With the 11th edition of the Team Hustle D series, our top priority was super-easy slip-on style. Elastic laces help give a wide opening. Big straps secure little feet. Even more, the cushioning is more plush than previous editions. The ultimate basketball and playtime shoe just got better.

title: Air Jordan 5 Retro Low
description: Sometimes you just gotta stunt on everyone at school. Do it right, with a pair of Js that have been helping people stunt since 1990. (That's right, 1990. Ancient history.) With premium leather in the uppers and all the hallmarks of the original AJ5, these classic lows are perfect for serving lunchtime looks—past, present and future.

title: Nike Team Hustle D 11
description: Ready for new basketball shoes? How about for gym class or just playing outside? Meet the Nike Team Hustle D 11. With this edition of our Team Hustle D series, our top priority is kicks that are super easy to get on and off. Elastic laces give you a wide opening while a big strap secures your fit. Plus, you get plush cushioning. The ultimate basketball and playtime shoe is back and ready to play.

title: England 2023 Stadium Home
category: Older Kids' Nike Dri-FIT Football Shirt
description: With a white and blue colourway, the England 2023 Home shirt nods to the national team's impassioned attempt to capture a championship in '84. A graffiti-inspired accent on the sleeves is paired with a deconstructed England graphic hidden on the inside to give this throwback design a modern feel. Like other shirts in our Stadium collection, this one pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking technology to give you a game-ready look inspired by the Lionesses

title: Nike Flex Runner 2
description: Running shoes made easy! The Nike Flex Runner 2 is for the kid on the go who loves to play all day—from gym class to a sprint down the block. They're lace-free, meaning they're super-quick to slip on and off. Who's ready to race?

title: Nike Pico 5
description: The Nike Pico 5 has a secure fit with great traction. It's made from durable material, comfortable cushioning and adjustable straps that are easy to get on and off.

title: Nike Star Runner 3
description: We've got some serious star power here. The Nike Star Runner 3 shoots for the sky with play-ready shoes made for each crawl to every growing step. We've added 2 straps for easy take-off, plus super-soft foam and lots of flexibility to rocket up the comfort. Designed with the Earth in mind, they're made from at least 20% recycled content by weight.

title: Nike Revolution 6
description: The Nike Revolution 6 is all about versatility for little athletes, from all-day play to anytime wear. With easy straps, kids can feel comfy and secure when slipping these on. Lightweight, breathable and made from at least 20% recycled material by weight—you can't go wrong with that.

title: Nike Force 1 LE
description: This is what legends are made of. The Nike Force 1 LE brings back the '82 hardwood icon into an everyday style in all-white or all-black. Let the durability, cushioning and feel introduce little feet to a classic.

title: Nike Omni Multi-Court
description: What's Omni, you ask? It means universal, inclusive and all—like for all your indoor sport needs. Durable and lightweight, they help make moving fast feel easy. Choose their favourite indoor court activity—volleyball, basketball, tennis, handball or PE lessons—and lace up!

title: Nike Force 1 LE
description: The Nike Force 1 LE brings back the '82 hardwood icon into an everyday style for kids with an all-white or all-black look. The durability, cushioning and feel introduce little feet to a classic.

title: Nike Tanjun EasyOn
description: Find your way to adventure fast with the Nike Tanjun EasyOn. The hands-free collapsible heel and extended tab let you slip them on and hit the road in seconds. A wide base, flex grooves and foam underfoot all work together so you can run, jump and play with confidence.

title: Nike Air Max SYSTM
description: Cassette mixtapes, music videos and shopping centre arcades—the '80s had it all. We're celebrating that gnarly era with the Nike Air Max SYSTM. From the big and bold Air unit in the heel to design lines inspired by our favourite throwback Air Max shoes, these kicks are all about bringing back what's cool and introducing it to a new generation.

title: Jumpman MVP
description: Honour Jordan's first 3 championships with a pair of kicks that collects details from each respective year's shoe and collages them together into one fire homage. Elements of the AJ6, 7 and 8 come to life in fresh new ways, right on your feet.

title: Nike Air Force 1 LV8
description: Let the fun shine through with these playful kicks. The legendary AF-1 design and comfortable Air cushioning make this hoops original the perfect shoe for playing every day. Plus, this version features a Swoosh logo that changes colour when exposed to UV light for fun in the sun with every step.

title: Nike Dynamo Go
description: Easy, snug and built for play any time—the Nike Dynamo Go will be your little one's next fave. What we love most is that kiddos can stomp down on the collapsible heel and slip in quick and easy. And if they're not quite ready to do it themselves, you can show them how it works so they can be free and independent! It's also soft and plush in the best places, so the fun never stops.

title: Nike Air Force 1
description: The Nike AF-1s are a legend. First on the basketball courts in the '80s. Now wearable everywhere from school to the playground. They've been an icon for decades—meaning a long time! Smooth durable leather lasts for many days of play. Fun colours bring an extra push to get you moving outside.

title: Nike Air Force 1
description: Icon. Legend. Classic. That's how we describe the Nike Air Force 1. Originally an all-star on the basketball court, this sneaker is now a superstar on the playground. Plus, the durable synthetic leather and Nike Air cushioning give you the timeless style and comfort that continues to make the AF-1 a slam dunk.

title: Nike Yoga
description: Stretch it out. Hold your pose. Breathe. The Nike Yoga Tank is designed to support every move with a close fit that stays in place. Made from fabric that'll keep you cool and ribbing details that stretch, you can feel confident this tank has your back.

title: Nike Sportswear Outdoor Play
description: From games of freeze tig to swinging on the monkey bars, this cargo skort is ready for all your favourite activities. Shorts underneath give you plenty of coverage as you run and play while a front panel creates the look of a skirt. Plus, roomy cargo pockets have space for all your essentials and small treasures. Use the full-length zip on the front to customise your fit and style—it's your choice how you wear it.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Academy23
description: Here at Academy23, we're all about encouraging you to work on those ball skills. Whether you're at training after school or out at break time, this soft, stretchy knit top is a great choice to keep you cool and comfortable. Plus, the classic fit gives you room to move without distractions. Ready, set, let's GOAL!

title: Nike Sportswear Icon Fleece
description: Bundle up and get cosy in this oversized sweatshirt. Made from soft fleece, it'll be your favourite go-to on days when you want to wrap yourself in warm comfort. Plus, a gold-foil print outlines a Swoosh logo, giving you style that's guaranteed to shine.

title: Nike Swoosh
description: It's the best of both worlds: an all-in-one Nike tank top and sports bra combo so you don't have to search the wardrobe for both if you're in a hurry. The lightweight tank top keeps the sweat away while you run, jump and play. The built-in bra gives plenty of support, too. You can wear it alone, or underneath your kit or jacket. The choice is yours.

title: Nike Swoosh
description: The Nike Swoosh Sports Bra is designed for comfort with smooth, sweat-wicking fabric to help you stay dry while you play.This product is made from at least 75% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike Sportswear Trend
description: Lightweight and roomy, these shorts are ready for your next move. Made from a smooth woven fabric that's no stranger to warm weather, they're a go-to on the playground, in a match or during the occasional water fight.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Throw it back with the Nike Sportswear Tracksuit. This classic combo has a versatile jacket and trousers that can be worn together or separately. Soft and comfy, it also has big logo stripes down the sides for signature Nike style.

title: Nike Dri-FIT One
description: Between school, training and playing with friends, we know your days are busy. That's why we made the Nike Dri-FIT One Leggings. As our most versatile leggings yet, their soft and stretchy fabric says goodbye to sweat to help make every move you make feel comfy no matter how many activities you squeeze into the day.

title: Nike Outdoor Play
description: Impromptu freeze tig games. Scaling the monkey bars. Running around at playtime. The Nike top is made for all your favourite activities. Part of our Outdoor Play collection, it's inspired by having fun and getting outside. Fabric is soft and sweat-wicking, plus who doesn't love the look of a pocket tee?

title: Nike One Leak Protection: Period
description: Life doesn't have time-outs. But that doesn't mean you should have to stop playing, training and having fun when you're on your period. These Dri-FIT One Shorts are specially made with an ultra-thin liner that helps prevent period leaks so you can do what you want, stress-free!

title: Nike ACG
description: We're serious when we say this Nike ACG dress is made for outdoor adventures. Part of our ACG collection (All Conditions Gear), it's designed to be durable for the fun times playing, camping and hiking outside. Plenty of pockets mean plenty of storage for your snacks and treasures. Pro tip: Pair it with a base layer top, plus bike shorts underneath for the coverage you need.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Victory
description: We took your favourite polo and gave it a sustainable update. The Nike Dri-FIT Victory Polo is crafted from lightweight, breathable fabric that's made from recycled materials. This classic design has a slightly longer, 4-button placket that keeps your look fresh. This product is made from 100% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Read it forwards. Read it backwards. It's awesome either way whenever you pull this Nike Sportswear tee on. Plus, the boxy fit feels a little looser everywhere to level up your T-shirt game.

title: Nike Flex Plus 2
description: The Nike Flex Plus 2 wastes no time so kids can get out to run and play. We're talking playtime, PE and their favourite activities. The innovative elastic band system makes getting these shoes on a breeze—they'll love it! They're breathable, plus durable in all the right places for little feet. Best of all: our designers made them super flexible so every move feels like their best and most natural.

title: Nike Air Max 90 LTR
description: The Nike Air Max 90 takes the original look to a new level with more comfort and flexibility, while keeping the classic Max Air cushioning you know and love.

title: Nike Run Flow
description: Are you a kid who likes to run as soon as you get out of bed? Whether it's heading off to school, break time or your favourite afternoon activities, you know how much fun running is. The Nike Run Flow helps you do all that with super-soft and responsive cushioning underfoot. This lightweight and breathable shoe also has easy-to-use toggle lacing so you can get out the door fast because why does fun have to wait?

title: Nike Air Max 90 LTR
description: The Air Max 90 returns with an even better feel for you. Cushioning is softer and more flexible than previous versions, the Max Air unit is tuned for growing feet and the shape gives your toes more wiggle room. With a design and look that are still the same, it brings a '90s fave to a new generation.

title: Nike Pico 5
description: The Nike Pico 5 has a secure fit with great traction. It's made from durable material, comfortable cushioning and adjustable straps that are easy to get on and off.

title: Nike Flex Plus 2
description: The Nike Flex Plus 2 wastes no time so you can get out the door to run and play. We're talking break time, PE class and all of your favourite activities. The innovative elastic band system makes getting these shoes on a breeze. They're breathable and durable in all the right places. Best of all: Our designers made these super flexible so every move feels like your best and most natural.

title: Nike Brasilia JDI
description: A small but mighty bag, the Nike Brasilia JDI Backpack is just the bag for wherever your day takes you. Perfect for hanging out with friends or adventuring around town, this bag features a spacious double-zip main compartment for the essentials and a smaller front pocket for the small stuff that you need to grab quickly.

title: Nike Air Force 1 LE
description: This is what legends are made of. The Nike Air Force 1 LE brings back the '82 hardwood icon into an everyday style in all-white or all-black. The durability, feel and Air are still there for those who love a classic.

title: Nike
description: From after-school training to a weekend hangout with friends, throw all your gear in and head for your next adventure. The adjustable drawstring closure makes it simple to carry, while helping keep your stuff secure.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Tracksuit jackets are awesome. Why? You can wear them at school, the park or wherever you go. Casual enough that you can pair it with almost anything. And it's lightweight, loose fitting and durable—a layer you'll love to rock. Plus, it's stamped by the Swoosh on both sides for double the approval.

title: Nike Club
description: Our beloved mascot is moving up in the world! Boxy started on tees and now joins in on headwear. Seen here on this mid-depth, curved-bill Club Cap, Boxy is sure to make all your friends and classmates feel welcome with a nice, big ol' wave.

title: Nike Apex
description: Enjoy the sun and add some fun to your look with the Nike Apex Bucket Hat. As easy to throw on as it is to pack away when you're not wearing it, this lightweight hat keeps you comfortable whenever the sun's out and adventure is on the menu!

title: Nike Apex
description: Sun glare doesn't stand a chance against the mid-depth Apex Bucket Hat. The Ripstop fabric is lightweight and durable with 360-degree coverage. The removable patches let you personalise the look again and again, while a pocket and webbing give you spots to carry extra art supplies, hidden treasure and whatever else you may find during the day.

title: Nike Heritage86
description: The Nike Heritage86 Hat is made from cotton twill fabric that's soft and durable. It has a classic design, with an adjustable back strap for a fit that feels just right.

title: Nike
description: With its simple design and fun print, this bag is great to go anywhere you need. Its large compartment is spacious enough to hold the gear you need to hang out with friends or have a great training session. Your essentials stay put with an adjustable drawstring for easy carrying.

title: Nike Club
description: Fly under the radar in this unstructured, mid-depth Nike Club Cap. Washed for a well-worn, well-loved look, it's a lightweight, easy-to-wear curved-brim cap with a simple design that you can add to practically any look.

title: Nike
description: Are you ready for an adventure? Because your fun friend is here! A large compartment holds the books and other gear you need, and a front pocket helps to organise the small stuff. A pencil case is attached to make writing utensils easy to access. Plus, the cool print inspires you to go, go, go!

title: Nike
description: The sun has no chance to creep in with the Nike Bucket Hat. It's versatile, durable and has you totally covered 360 degrees in the shade.

title: Nike Brasilia
description: To the gym, to school or to hang out with friends, this bag has space for it all. A large zip compartment is there to hold your books or training gear—with slots for school items—while a smaller front pocket holds quick-grab things. Bonus: A clip attached to 1 of the mesh pockets holds your keys.

title: Nike
description: Whether it's rushing to class or hanging out after school with friends, this backpack has the space to tackle it all. This bag features a large side pocket for water bottles as well as a front pocket to store quick-grab items. Adjustable padded straps make wearing this bag comfortable and easy.

title: Nike Brasilia JDI
description: Sport your wild style. This mini backpack has plenty of room in its large main compartment to hold your essentials while hanging out with friends or heading to the urban jungle. A small front pocket is there to keep the small stuff organised, and padded shoulder straps are adjustable for your comfort.

title: Nike
description: The Nike Bucket Hat shades your head all the way around so you can feel as cool as you look. The hat reverses from a dot-dye printed side to a colour-blocked design that reps the brand. This product is made from at least 75% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike Classic
description: Scaled down to size for your little one, the Nike Classic Kids' Backpack sits comfortably on smaller shoulders. It features several zip pockets for easy, secure storage on your daily adventures.
colour: Deep Royal Blue/Deep Royal Blue/Jade Ice

title: Nike Dri-FIT Club
description: A multisport MVP, the Club Cap has Nike AeroBill and sweat-wicking tech that combine to keep you cool and comfortable whether you're training or chasing your friends. Lighter and more flexible than traditional types, this curved-brim cap helps shade your eyes so you can bring your A-game.
